description: This plugin allows administrators add the "Course meta link" and "Cohort sync" enrolment methods to a range of courses from a CSV file, and specify the role for the methods participants. They can also delete, enable or disable existing enrolment methods in a course.

name: Upload block settings
description: This plugin allows administrators to upload a CSV file containing block settings for courses. You can add or delete blocks, so the tool enables you to apply a default set of blocks for some or all courses on a site.  You can also reset the set of course blocks to the default for that course format.

name: Grouptool
description: The grouptool module (mod/grouptool) enhances the functionality of Moodle default groups. Two of the additional features are the possibility for students to enrol themselves in groups with waiting lists, and the transfer of grades within groups.

name: Offline Quiz
description: The MC Offline quiz module (mod/offlinequiz) adds paper-and-pencil multiple-choice quizzes to Moodle. In offline quizzes students mark answers to questions on a sheet of paper (the answer form).

name: Gapfill
description: Cloze (fill in the blanks) question type with VERY simple question creation syntax. Can do drag drop, dropdowns or gapfill questions

name: Quiz archive report
description: Moodle quiz report plugin to achieve archiving your test, by printing out all attempts at once.

name: Etherpad Lite
description: An activity module to integrate etherpad-lite with Moodle. To use this plugin, you will need to have an etherpad-lite server that runs on at least the same 2nd-level-domain as your Moodle server.

name: HTTP Basic authentication
description: Enable services and users to authenticate using basic auth.

name: Dialogue
description: Dialogue between two users

name: Coupon
description:
The Sebsoft Coupon Plugin offers you the possibility to create coupons for various levels
of course access. Using a coupon code, users will be enrolled into courses that are attached to the coupon.

name: Download private files from other moodle platforms
description: my_external_privatesfiles is a Moodle block that enable a user to retirieve a zip of his private files from one or more external moodles

name: Restore courses from remote Moodles
description:
block my_external_backup_courses : Restore courses from remote moodle platforms
my_external_backup_restore_courses is a Moodle block that enable a user to restore courses from external moodles
this block must be installed in each moodle course clients and course servers involved

name: Rocket.Chat
description: This plugin allows teachers to keep synchronized users enrolled in a Moodle course into a dedicated Rocket.Chat private channel.

name: External content
description: The module enables a teacher to create a resource using the text editor. The resource can display text, images, sound, video and web links. Advantages of using the External content module rather than the standard page module is that optionally if the content links to an external site that records a completion status these can then be imported.

name: Merge user accounts
description: This administration tool will merge two Moodle user accounts into one.

name: Cohort based additional html settings.
description: Allows additionalhtml settings to be applied based on the users site-level cohorts

name: Custom fields for activity modules
description: This plugin adds Custom Fields to all activity modules.

name: Random activity
description: The "Random activity" activity type is a lightweight module that allows teachers to randomly split students among other activities within a course.

name: Featured Courses
description: This blocks allow to select some courses to be displayed on front page. It is also possible to set sort order.

name: Fordson
description:
The Fordson theme is focused on students going from login to learning, with features that help teachers build better courses and students engage with content.  Your school is unique and Fordson provides impressive customizations for a professional and modern learning platform.
Try out Fordson and show some love by clicking "favourite" ( ♥ ) !

name: H5P content types
description: This plugin imports various H5P content types into Moodle question types

name: Marks per section
description: Quiz report plugin showing marks per section.

name: Moodle Mobile language strings
description: This plugin is for translating the Moodle Mobile app strings in AMOS only. (There is no point in installing it on your site.)

name: Grade overview
description: The block provides an overview of student grades, based on the course grade report. This plugin allows the course teacher to select the activities that make up the evaluation group, which will be shown in the block! It allows different visions for monitoring the student and the teacher, where each one can follow the progress of carrying out the activities as well as the grades acquired.

name: eTask topics format
description: Place the grading table with additional functionality directly on the course page and manage gradable activities easily. Provide your students a quick overview of grading and motivate them to be better.

name: Oauth2 token unlink event
description: The following plugin allows you to remove emails from linking accounts in moodle with oauth2 services, useful in cases where the linking message was never delivered and the entry is blocked with the user's account, allowing administrator this linking process to be performed again.

name: Secure PDF
description: Share your PDF to students without letting them to download or save it.

name: Set course fields
description: Moodle admin tool plugin which allows managers to set and overwrite custom course field values for all courses in a category, including subcategories.

name: UbiCast MediaServer block plugin
description: A block plugin for Moodle to embed MediaServer channels in courses.

name: All-or-Nothing Multiple Choice
description: The all-or-nothing multiple choice question is a version of the core multi-answer multiple choice question with modified grading. In an all-or-nothing multiple choice question, a respondent can choose one or more answers. If the chosen answers correspond exactly to the correct choices defined in the question, the respondent gets 100%. If he/she chooses any incorrect choices or does not select all of the correct choices, the grade is 0%.

name: Profile field based theme delivery
description: Moodle plugin which lets admins deliver a certain theme based on a user's custom profile field

name: Profile field based cohort membership
description: Moodle plugin which lets admins manage cohort memberships based on users' custom profile fields

name: Restriction by course role
description: Moodle availability plugin which lets users restrict resources, activities and sections based on roles

name: Restriction by password
description: Moodle availability plugin which lets users restrict resources and activities with password access

name: Restriction by cohort
description: Moodle availability plugin which lets users restrict resources, activities and sections based on cohorts.

name: Organization management
description: The organizational module allows you to build one or more corporate hierarchies of any structure.

name: StudentQuiz
description: StudentQuiz enables students to collaboratively create their own question pools in Moodle. Students can filter these questions into quizzes, and they can rate and comment questions while working through the quizzes. StudentQuiz computes each students contribution and learning progress and compares this with the community. The created questions become part of the Moodle question bank and can be reused in other Moodle quizzes. The video "StudentQuiz in a minute" tube.switch.ch/videos/d0e37788 provides a quick introduction.

name: Clear Backup Files
description: Course backups can be an expensive task at times. It could take loads of unnecessary space and memory on the server. Administrators can clear backup files on the server  to free the server space.

name: Courses links
description: Mod which allows to display links in your course to other courses (to facilitate navigation between courses for example). This mod is displayed in a label.

name: Availability Block Game by level
description: Restrict access to course content until students reach the required level in the Block Game.

name: Grade Me
description: Shows a teacher all of the assignments and manual quiz questions (essays and file responses) that have been submitted, but not graded.

name: Completion Progress
description: The Completion Progress block is a time-management tool for students.

name: Dictionary
description: Adds a dictionary and thesaurus block to Moodle powered by the Merriam-Webster API.

name: Moodle glossary entries
description: A question format plugin to convert between quiz questions and glossary entries

name: Ad-hoc database queries
description:
This report plugin allows Administrators to set up arbitrary database queries
to act as ad-hoc reports. Reports can be of two types, either run on demand,
or scheduled to run automatically. Other users with the right capability can
go in and see a list of queries that they have access to. Results can be viewed
on-screen or downloaded as CSV.

name: Cross XML format
description: This input format plugin is a handy utility that converts questions from one question type to another.

name: Enlightlite
description: Enlight Lite is a beautiful and fully responsive Moodle theme well suited for Universities,Schools & Online learning websites.

name: Poodll Subtitle
description: Poodll Subtitle is a simple subtitle editor for audio and video files in Moodle.

name: Deferred feedback (all or nothing)
description:
This is a question behaviour for Moodle Quiz that forces all questions to
be graded all or nothing using deferred feedback mode. It will work with
a variety of question types that normally produce credit for partially
correct responses

name: telegram_forum
description: This block allows teachers to automatically send all new forum topics to Telegram Channels.

name: Adaptive mode (all or nothing)
description: This is a question behaviour for Moodle Quiz that forces all questions to be graded all or nothing using adaptive mode. It will work with a variety of question types that normally produce credit for partially correct responses i.e. cloze, matching, OU drag and drop types etc.

name: Leeloo LXP Content API Plugin
description: This plugin handles the authenticated API calls to sync the content plugins data from Leeloo LXP to Moodle LMS.

name: Leeloo LXP FAQ
description: Add an awesome responsive FAQ section to your home page, dashboard or static pages Manage all settings in a single page, right from your Leeloo LXP theme back end.

name: Moodle plugin skeleton generator
description: Allows developers to quickly generate code skeleton for a new Moodle plugin.

name: CADO: Course outline & approval
description: Generates an interactive curriculum report from Moodle-held course information. Provides a course approval workflow within Moodle. Allows course variants to be compared, with differences highlighted. Upon approval, displays to students in either browser or Moodle app.

name: Moove
description: Moove it's a modern theme, simple and focused on the main content. You can minimize both side columns to enjoy the maximum of space in your environment. If you like it, please show some love by clicking "favourite" ( ♥ ) below!

name: Shibboleth Link
description: This is an extension to the normal shibboleth authentication plugin and allows users to decide if they want to have a new account created based on their shibboleth login, or if they want to link the shibboleth-login to an existing account.

name: Checklist
description: A checklist can be created by a teacher (or generated from the activities in a course) and then the students or teachers can check-off each item as they are completed.

name: Multi-Language Content
description: This plugin will make the creation of multilingual contents on Moodle much more easier with Atto editor.

name: Cloud Poodll Question - audio and video assessments
description: The Cloud Poodll audio video recording question allows students to record audio or video directly into Moodle quizzes. It has no dependencies and recordings are stored in the Poodll cloud. The teacher has a choice of audio and video recorders to use. It supports time limits.

name: SAML2 Single sign on
description: SAML done 100% in moodle, fast, simple, secure

name: Regular expression short answer
description: This question type (for the Moodle quiz module) aims at a more advanced system of student's response analysis, through the use of regular expresssions. This question type is an extension of the SHORTANSWER type. It can be used on its own and can also be incorporated into the existing Cloze (embedded) question type.

name: Reader
description: The Reader module for Moodle 2.x tracks the students' reading achievements.

name: Motrain/Mootivated block
description: Display the user's coin count for the session and can show the avatar if enabled. This requires the Mootivated/Motrain plugin.

name: Course Category Finder
description:
Course Category Finder is an extended version of the Course Finder Block. An Option is added to 
enable the user to search for categories as well as the courses. Aditional search filter and sort filter is added to search courses by start date, end date, course format and completion criteria.

name: Swipe
description: Get feedback on text, images and videos in a fun interactive way

name: Format Timeline
description: A simple timeline to simulate a real social network course in moodle.

name: ConfMan
description:
Moodle Plugin that helps organizing submissions for events like conferences. Add a "confman"-Activity to a course and you can specify a timerange when submissions are possible. You are given a link that can be shared outside moodle to allow external people (also without Moodle-Login) to submit submissions for your event. Everybody in your course that has instructor-role is allowed to manage all submissions. Everybody in your course that has student-role is allowed to comment submissions.

Submitters can manage their own submissions using a unique link that is given to them.

name: H5P Filter
description: This filter adds the possibility to get h5p content being automatically embedded in textfields based on the activityname.

name: Notify Cohorts
description: Send custom notifications to members of selected cohorts

name: More background colours
description: This is intended to be a replacement for the core backcolor Atto plugin, allowing the Moodle administrator to freely define a set of colours that can be used by users.

name: Assignment submission and export report
description: Assignment report and data/files export. Particularly handy for anonymous assignments.

name: More font colours
description: This plugin is intended as a replacement of the core atto_fontcolor plugin, allowing the Moodle admin to define a set of colours to be available.

name: JClic
description: This module allows the incorporation of JClic activities in Moodle and save its state.

name: RegExp Adaptive mode with Help (no penalties)
description: This plugin is one of the 2 question behaviours to be used exclusively with the regexp question type. Those behaviours enable you to take advantage of the *Help* feature, which allows the student to "buy" a letter. This behaviour does not cost the student any penalty when "buying" a letter.

name: RegExp Adaptive mode with Help
description: This plugin is one of the 2 question behaviours to be used exclusively with the regexp question type. Those behaviours enable you to take advantage of the *Help* feature, which allows the student to "buy" a letter.

name: HTML5 audio/video to MP4 filter
description: This filter allows the automated creation of MP4 sources for HTML5  and  elements.

name: Google Analytics
description: Google Analytics with custom dimensions and metrics.

name: Flexible menu
description: Remove and add menu items easily, customize Moodle menu with just a few clicks.

name: Leeloo LXP Attendance
description: Boost engagement with the time tracking front end block!

name: Leeloo LXP Login and Attendance Tracking
description: Login and Attendance | Real-Time Tracking

name: Leeloo LXP Activities and Resources Tracking
description: Learning Activities and Resources | Real-Time Tracking

name: Leeloo LXP Synchronizer
description: This tool will synchronize data from Moodle LMS to Leeloo LXP.

name: Custom certificate
description: Enables the creation of dynamically generated certificates with complete customisation via the web browser.

name: Ordering
description: Ordering question type for Moodle 2.x and Moodle 3.x

name: Offlinequiz Cronjob
description: The Offline Quiz Cron plugin adds an interface to the Offline Quiz activity (mod_offlinequiz) to inspect and change pending cronjobs for the Offline Quiz.

name: Checkmark
description: This module (mod/checkmark) allows teachers to obtain information about the assignments completed by the students prior to a lesson.

name: Marklar
description: Reclaim the control over formatting your text with this Markdown friendly editor for Moodle. Markdown is a lightweight markup language with plain text formatting syntax. It allows you to write using an easy-to-read, easy-to-write plain text format that is automatically converted to structurally valid HTML.

name: H5P button plugin for TinyMCE editor
description: Plugin creates a new H5P button in TinyMCE editor toolbar allowing to add and edit H5P blocks inside the editor.

name: Cohort role synchronization
description: Automatically synchronize cohort members into system roles.

name: Meta-course group synchronization
description: Automatically synchronize groups from child courses into meta-courses.

name: Learning Analytics Log
description: Privacy-friendly logstore for the Learning Analytics plugin

name: Lessonspace
description: Teach live, one-on-one, or with a group, using the most versatile collaborative space for online lessons.

name: Contactlist
description: The contactlist plugin allows students to decide if they want to share their contact information with their fellow students in accordance with the GDPR for each course they are registered in.

name: Templates4U
description: This is an atto plugin for Moodle which allows the administrator to define a set of predefined templates which a teacher can insert into their course pages.

name: Debate
description: Debate is a moodle activity which allows students to debate in a given topic inside moodle.

name: Wordcloud
description: With the wordcloud activity, it is possible to collect terms together with your course participants in a brainstorming process and to display them graphically in order of frequency. This can be used, for example, to capture a picture of the mood or to create a basis for a discussion.

name: Moodle Mobile app section and activity availability restrictions
description: With this plugin you can choose if an activity, resource or a complete section is (or is not) visible for users accessing the course via the Mobile app.

name: LinkAdv
description:
This is an atto plugin for Moodle which is a drop-in replacement for the default atto_link plugin.

It adds an extra couple of fields to the link dialog: id and class. These allow the user to create bookmarks or add styles to their links (e.g. btn btn-primary for Bootstrap-based themes).

name: Turnitin Integrity Plugin
description: Utilize Turnitin Integrity’s Similarity Report and Authorship investigating tools within Moodle’s assignment workflow by integrating with the Turnitin Integrity plugin. Turnitin Integrity is a commercial plagiarism and authorship detection system whose features depend on which paid license has been selected. This plugin is developed and maintained by Turnitin.

name: CSV Enrolls & Groups plugin
description: Use this local plugin to import user enrollments and group assignments from a delimited text file into the course. New user accounts will not be created, so each of the users listed in the input file must already have an account set up in the site.

name: Web Analytics
description: A Moodle admin tool adding Web Analytics to your Moodle site. The plugin currently supports following analytics tools: Matomo (formerly Piwik), Google Universal Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Google Legacy Analytics (soon deprecated by Google)

name: Checkmark report
description: The checkmark report (local/checkmarkreport) is an extension to the module checkmark and shows the marks and grades for one or more checkmarks in a tabular form.

name: Grade distribution
description: The gradereport gradedist module allows for viewing the distribution of student grades for a course regarding the current grade letter boundaries as well as changing these to shift the distribution.

name: Download Center
description: The Download Center plugin (local/downloadcenter) enables all users to download all files, folders as well as all documents of student folders of an entire course as a ZIP archive with a clear folder structure.

name: Restriction by section completion
description: Restrict resources, activities and sections based on other sections being completed

name: Quizventure
description: Quizventure is an activity module that loads quiz questions from the course it's added to. The possible answers come down as space ships and you have to shoot the correct one.

name: Admin presets
description: Allow administrators to export the site settings to .xml presets, import and load other sites presets.

name: Soft Course format
description: Softcourse is a course format that display sections with only an image and an optional text on the course homepage. Users don’t see the detail of the section, for instance, resources or activities.

name: Metadata
description: The “local metadata” plugin has been created to allow extra, “metadata” to be defined and assigned to various context level elements in Moodle. It is an abstraction of the current “user profile field” functionality in Moodle and contains much of the same code. This was written for the MUA as a proof of concept for a project to add extra profile data to courses, to see whether one metadata function could be used for multiple Moodle contexts. It is currently in Beta, and is open for participation and discussion.

name: Basic course search
description: This plugin simply displays Moodle's course search form in a block.

name: Allocation form
description: The Allocation form module is designed to allow instructors of a course to create slots that the students can sign themselves up to.

name: Tutorial Booking
description:
The tutorial booking module is designed to allow instructors of a course
to create slots that the students can sign themselves up to.

name: Course Module navigation
description: A block to show the users a summary (like a table of contents) of a course with section names and a list of all resources and activities. If activity completion is used in the course, course navigation block will display a circle (either empty or green)

name: Course checker
description: A Moodle course checker plugin that improves the quality and eliminate human routine tasks in online courses.

name: FontAwesome icons
description: This filter allows you to use fontawesome icons in the Moodle text editor without worrying about the HTML syntax.

name: Matrícula paga pelo Pagseguro
description: Plugin que permite a inscrição de estudantes por pagamento direto ou por assinatura mensal usando o PagSeguro.

name: Plugins fetcher
description: This plugin retrieves information about installed plugins.

name: Virtual Programming Lab
description: VPL is an activity module to manage programming assignments

name: Twitter card
description: This Moodle local plugin emits a Twitter summary card for courses.

name: Syntax Highlighter
description: This is a filter plugin that uses a 3rd party Javascript module called highlight.js to make your code look like something you'd see in an IDE.

name: Contact Form
description: Contact Form is a Moodle plugin that allows your site to process and send information submitted through HTML web forms to the site's support email address or primary administrator if the support email address is not defined.

name: FilterCodes
description: The FilterCodes filter enables Moodle content creators to easily customize and personalize site and course content using over 140 plain text tags. Version 2.2 introduces 12 new FilterCodes including tags to list teacher, course request link, a conditional tag based on custom profile fields, tags to display support information, a menu of tools for developer and more. You can now even create your own global tags.

name: SynHi filter
description: Syntax highlights 'code' or 'pre' tags with either EnlighterJS or SyntaxHighlighter.  Either can be chosen by the administrator with a choice of styles.  Before deciding a 'preview' is shown.

name: Eguru
description: The Guru of moodle themes e-Guru - ultra responsive moodle theme with multi color pattern is free now in moodle plugin directory.It has stunning features that will be a suitable choice for your educational establishments and coming out with powerful admin theme setting options.

name: Poodll Assignment Submission - audio and video recording
description: The Poodll Assignment Submission allows students to record audio or video, or draw/upload pictures as assignment submissions.

name: Klass
description: Klass is fully responsive and coded with the latest techniques in HTML5 and CSS3,so it will work on all devices, all browsers, and it does it all seamlessly.Just download and make your e-learn website modern.

name: Academi
description: Academi is a clever responsive moodle free theme ever suitable for your academy. Academi is a modern and customizable theme for all supported Moodle versions.

name: Poodll Recording
description: An audio/video recording question type for Moodle. It uses HTML5 audio and video recording on supported browsers, and falls back to flash and other technologies where required. It is also possible to provide responses to questions using the Poodll whiteboard feature. It requires the Poodll filter be installed. Recording from mobile devices is also supported.

name: Alipay
description: Alipay payment gateway for Moodle.

name: WeChat
description: WeChat payment gateway for Moodle.

name: YU Kaltura Media Resource
description: Media Resource plugin for third-party's non-KAF "YU Kaltura Media Package"

name: Pcast
description: Activity module to create podcasts in Moodle

name: Filtered course list
description: The Filtered Course List block displays a configurable list of courses. It is intended as a replacement for the My Courses block, although both may be used. It is maintained by the Collaborative Liberal Arts Moodle Project (CLAMP).

name: Feedback viewer
description: The Feedback Viewer report displays the responses from all Feedback modules in a given course, filtered by user.

name: Links
description: This block is allows a site administrator to display links to users based on specific user profile fields

name: Remote course web service
description: This local module provides a web service which returns a given user's courses based on username.

name: Roster
description: This is a simple report which displays the user pictures for everyone enrolled in the given course.

name: Multiple graders
description: Advanced grading form allowing multiple graders for assignments

name: XML data format
description: Data format plugin for exporting as XML.

name: Annulab LRS
description: This block for Moodle gives an access to the own historical data sent by the moodle's logstore_xapi and tincanlaunch plugins to the LRS of Annulab. A free subscription at https://lrsdata.com is required. The LRS allows anyone who is connected to import his own data in a JSON format file archived into a ZIP file

name: My last course
description: Sometimes we forget which course or module we've consulted last time because we were interrupted by an important event. This block gives access to the last course and last module viewed.

name: YU Kaltura Media for Atto
description: Atto HTML editor's sub-plugin for third-party's non-KAF "YU Kaltura Media Package"

name: YU Kaltura Media Assignment
description: Media Assignment plugin for third-party's non-KAF "YU Kaltura Media Package"

name: YU Kaltura Media Gallery
description: Media gallery plugin for third-party's non-KAF "YU Kaltura Media Package"

name: YU Kaltura Media Local Libraries
description: Local libraries plugin for third-party's non-KAF "YU Kaltura Media Package"

name: LDAP syncing scripts
description: This plugin synchronizes Moodle cohorts against an LDAP directory using either group memberships or attribute values.

name: Upgrade log
description: Report listing Moodle upgrade history for your site.

name: Course Life Cycle
description:
Course Life Cycle is a moodle plugin, which has the purpose to help you with the execution of reoccurring tasks on your moodle platform. Possible use cases are (not limited to):

    Deleting courses at end of life (including asking teachers for permission).
    Doing a rollover at the end of a semester.
    Automatically setting an end date for courses.

name: Enrolment upon approval
description: The enrolment plugin "enrol on approval" adds an approval step into the course enrolment process. Users will be informed by mail as soon as their course application has been approved/ rejected.

name: Token generator
description: An admin tool provides a web service for generating Moodle web service tokens. It conceptually works the same way as /login/token.php, but via web services.

name: Moodle Adminer
description:
This plugin is based on the great tool adminer.
The main advantage of this plugin is, it can handle different types of database. So it works with MySQL/MariaDB, PostgreSQL, Oracle and MSSQL.

name: Mail
description: Webmail-like messaging

name: Realtime Quiz
description: Face-to-face quiz with all students answering the questions at the same time.

name: Checklist
description: This is a grade export plugin which will create an Excel spreadsheet containing all the checkmarks from a single checklist.

name: Checklist
description: This is a block which works with the checklist module and displays progress bars for a single checklist.

name: Lesson objectives
description: Displays current lesson objectives in the side-bar

name: Navigation buttons
description: Add customisable navigation buttons (next/prev/etc.) to the bottom of each activity page (Moodle 1.9/2.0+)

name: Rounded theme
description: Rounded theme advantages are simplicity and clarity. It provides you great freedom to change the look and feel of your Moodle site. It is part of a corporate user experience package which ensures that the Moodle portal can be provided with a much more user-friendly interface to meet enterprise expectations, and features that make the interface much more customizable for a company.

name: Unicheck Plagiarism Checker Plugin
description: Designed based on educators’ feedback, Unicheck is a plagiarism detection engine helping educators spot plagiarism. To start using the app, please register at https://unicheck.com or get in touch with the sales team at sales@unicheck.com. It takes a few minutes to set-up your account and get the ball rolling. This plugin integrates with assignment, forum and workshop activities in Moodle to check user-submitted content for plagiarism.

name: Common Courses
description: This block lists any courses you have in common (i.e. you are both enrolled in) with the user whose profile you are viewing.

name: Chunkupload
description:
This plugin offers a new form element for moodle forms.
The form element is a file upload field, which uploads one file as multiple small chunks.
While uploading the form element shows a progress bar to the user.

name: Learning Plans Progress
description: This blocks shows the progress of learning plans in a vertical progress bar with "check" icons for each competency. It's also possible to display the competencies's descriptions and access the courses related to each competency.

name: Exabis Library
description:
The block can be accessed from within any course. The admin can add any kind of document using the "manage library" link of the block.
New entries can be made with references to the source, links, file, content and author. Also categories can be defined with the link "manage categories".
With the search box the library can be searched as a whole or within each category.

name: Bulk Activity Creation
description: This block plugin allows users to create activities/resources in bulk. In other words, a moodle module can be copied to one or more courses or one or more categories/subcategories in one go.

name: Moodle PHPdoc check
description: Tool for Moodle developers: allows to check phpdocs in the code for compliance with Moodle Coding Style.

name: PlagiarismSearch
description: PlagiarismSearch has been operating since 2008 as an in-demand solution even for the most exacting clients who seek multilayered check in numerous languages, utmost confidentiality of services, and continuous updates in functionality. Universities and content companies around the globe can make use of the customized services of plagiarism detection provided at the maximum level of professionalism. A free 30-day trial with 100 submissions is a great chance to test the service with no further commitments. Still, most of the clients pay for a full plagiarism search package after the trial month is over.

name: Sophos SAV-DI antivirus
description: This plugin adds virus scanner support for the Sophos SAV-DI daemon.

name: Quiz Wifi Resilience Mode
description: The Wifiresilience accessrule is designed to allow students to continue work on deferred-feedback quiz attempts even if the network connection goes down. For this purpose Wifiresilience makes use of localstorage. Stored answers can be accessed, synced to server and also be downloaded manually in case connection does not come back.

name: Dropout Detective™
description: Dropout Detective™ identifies students that are most at risk of dropping out of or failing courses.

name: Image optimiser
description: Resize images to a configurable maximum size. Delay the loading of images until visible in the viewport.

name: Generate custom CSS for Moodle Mobile
description: A plugin to help override the default colors for Moodle Mobile and manage other custom CSS. It walks you through picking out replacement colors and adding other custom CSS, then generates a file for you to set as your mobile CSS.

name: Overview statistics
description: Produces various site and course report charts. The code has been designed in a way that makes adding more reports easy.

name: Ad-hoc filter for UbiCast Atto plugin
description: Starting in the next release of atto_ubicast, an  HTML tag will be injected instead. This tag's usage is unrestricted and is then turned into an iframe at the rendering stage by this plugin.

name: Offline
description: This Advanced Grading plugin allows course administrators to submit rubrics they have created offline and have it automatically inserted into the system when uploaded to use for grading.

name: Restriction by credit
description: Pay with credits for course contents

name: Course credit enrolment
description: The easiest e-commerce solution for moodle: Use credits to buy courses.

name: Skype
description: Skype activity plugin module implements a user listing and shows, Create Conference, Create Chat, Send Voicemail, Add Contact, and Send File links to any user who has entered a Skype ID into their profile.

name: Leeloo LXP Content Filter
description: The Leeloo LXP Content Filter allows you to use shortcodes on a page without a { content – region } and display any of the Leeloo LXP Content Plugins from the Suite in the { content – region }.

name: CAPQuiz
description: CAP is short for Computer Adaptive Practice. In CAPQuiz, the proficiency is measured by a rating.  Good answers increase the rating, and bad answers decrease it.  To increase the rating, students need to give good answers more of than bad ones over time. Estimating question difficulty is known to be difficult. CAPQuiz automates this process to some extent. The question author must provide an initial estimate, but CAPQuiz improves the estimates based by comparing how the same student answers different questions. Hence the rated question sets will improve over time.

name: 'ōhie format
description:
This plugin will be used to import questions (multichoice, multichoiceset,  	shortanswer, essay, truefalse and numerical) from a CSV(Comma separated value) file into the question bank.
'ōhie: means easy to do in tahitian

name: UbiCast MediaServer atto button
description: Atto plugin to insert media from an UbiCast MediaServer in text areas

name: UbiCast MediaServer Moodle activity plugin
description:
This Moodle activity module allows users to add media or channels from a UbiCast MediaServer in their courses.
They can also edit media directly from Moodle without having to go on the MediaServer site.

name: edu-sharing Filter
description: The edu-sharing filter displays embedded edu-sharing content.

name: Quickmail
description: A block that provides selective, bulk emailing within courses. Developed by LSU.

name: Schoollege
description: Introducing a new theme for Moodle 3.9 and 3.10 that draws on some of the best user ehancements of the Fordson and Rebel Moodle themes!  Schoollege is refined, elegant, and modern.  Built using Boost, Schoollege adds custom header images, header textures, smart editing buttons, a full-screen Course Dashboard, a custom login page, and other features that enhance Moodle.

name: Easy Enrollments block
description: The Easy Enrollments block is block with form from Easy Enrollments method, which was available only in supported themes. From now you can use this enrolment method properly without supported theme prerequisity.

name: Login using Moodle Users
description: Login using Moodle Users is a local plugin where users can login to their external applications and Websites using their Moodle website credentials. Users will authenticate themselves via their Moodle credentials only once and they can access all the external applications.

name: Learning by concordance management
description: Module allowing the management of a learning by concordance activity, including the management of the panel of experts and the compilation of the answers.

name: Concordance of reasoning
description: Question type subplugin for concordance of reasoning questions (also known as Script concordance test).

name: Concordance of judgment
description: Question type subplugin for concordance of judgment questions, based on the main question type for concordance questions (https://moodle.org/plugins/qtype_tcs).

name: moofactory Notifications
description: moofactory-Notifications is a  plugin that allows to send customized and personalized e-mails for course registrations, reminders for calendar events or non-connection.

name: JoomdleBS
description: This theme is created to be used in Joomdle sites only (http://joomdle.com). Some parts like the header, footer and login link have been removed deliberately.

name: WIMS Course
description: Add a WIMS class as an activity.

name: OSS Enrolment
description: Enrolment to manage groups, classes, teachers, students and parents infrastructure for an open school server (oss).

name: SAML Identity Provider
description:
This is a plugin that makes Moodle an Identity Provider site: other application can use Moodle as a login portal.
Requires SimpleSAMLphp, configured as IdP: https://simplesamlphp.org/docs/stable/simplesamlphp-idp.

name: FULLFace access rule
description:
E-proctoring solution to authentication user with facil biometrics while doing a quiz attempt.
Solução de autenticação por reconhecimento facial enquanto o aluno responde um questionário.

name: Bongo
description: Bongo is a video assessment solution for soft skill development and the real-world application of knowledge.

name: Use template on course creation
description: This local plugin allows site administrators to create "template" courses which will be restored into new courses on course creation.

name: Resource notification
description: This Moodle plugin allows a teacher to notify course students by internal messaging when a new resource/activity is created or modified into a course.

name: MUMIE Single Sign On
description: This plugin allows Moodle users to access content on the e-learning platform MUMIE without having to register a new account or to login. MUMIE Single Sign On is not meant to be used as a standalone but in combination with  MUMIE Task (https://github.com/integral-learning/moodle-mod_mumie). Together, these two plugins allow the integration of MUMIE content into your Moodle courses.

name: Google Meet™ for Moodle
description: The Google Meet™ for Moodle plugin allows the teacher, without having to leave Moodle, to create a Google Meet room and make available to the students the recordings of the room saved in Google Drive.

name: All backups
description: This report allows access to all backups on a site - including those stored in the users private files area and the site admin can download/restore or delete the backup files.

name: Restriction by single quiz question
description:
This is a Moodle conditional availability rule, which makes it possible
to show or hide another resource, based on the state of one particular question
in one quiz.

name: Fullscreen toggle button
description:
The Fullscreen toggle button expands the content area by hiding all side blocks.
Themes based on bootstrapbase / clean theme are supported.

name: Learning Plan Auto-complete
description: With this plugin installed, all learning plans will be marked as complete when all their competencies are completed by the user.

name: TurtleStitch submissions
description: Add to your Moodle assignments the ability to include TurtleStitch projects

name: BeetleBlocks submissions
description: Add to your Moodle assignments the ability to include BeetleBlock projects

name: Snap4Arduino submissions
description: Add to your Moodle assignments the ability to include SnapArduino projects

name: Snap! submissions
description: Add to your Moodle assignments the ability to include Snap! projects

name: Exabis Games
description:
The goal of this activity is to bring the aspect of game-based-learning into Moodle-courses. 

The way the acitivity works is that two of  our exagames are based upon quizzes given to students within a Moodle course (braingame and exaclick), one activity links games created with the OpenSource-platform gamelabs.at directly into Moodle courses. See readme.txt for further instructions.

name: Restriction by Enrolment date
description:
This is an availability plugin to restrict the access of activity based on the
user enrolment date

name: Content translation filter
description: The Content translation filter provides a way to quickly translate the content of Moodle courses into different languages.

name: Leeloo LXP Synchronizer Block
description: Sync Moodle LMS Courses and Activities/Resources with Leeloo LXP, quick and easy!

name: Newsletter
description: This is a newsletter module for moodle. First stable release. It provides the basic features of common newsletter tools. Using it with moodle VERP bounce processing is recommended. But we will add an additional bounce processing feature that will be easier to configure.

name: Course description label
description: The course description plugin is a resource which displays the course name and the course description on the course page (at the location where it is placed). It is a small but handy tool.

name: Free seats report
description: With this moodle block you can generate a report containing courses with free seats AND which having the starting date (course settings) within the upcoming n weeks. The information about free seats is taken from the activated self enrolment plugin AND/OR waitlist enrolment plugin.

name: Upload external content completions
description: Provides a bulk upload tool to load completions results for Moodle Courses that consist of a single External Content Activity, the information is loaded from a Text Delimited File

name: Event Trigger
description: This plugin plugin allows site administrators to trigger external actions such as an http request or email when certain events happen in Moodle. Filters can be added to check if the event meets certain conditions and actions(email/http post) can include information contained within the Moodle event. Lookups can also be added to the workflow to allow information not contained within the Moodle event to be exposed to the external action.

name: RESTful protocol
description:
A REStful webservice plugin for Moodle LMS

This plugin allows Moodle's webservice interface to operate in a more RESTFul way.
Instead of each webservice call having a URL query parameter define what webservice function to use, webservice functions are made available by discrete URLs.

name: Students tracker
description: This block aims to give teachers and staff a simple tool to view how many students didn't visit a course for a long time and doing so, tries to reduce student's dropping out.

name: Exabis Student Review
description: With this block, teachers can create detailed periodical reviews of their students. The module lets teachers/trainers team-assess students. The assessment can be done on different scales that can be defined.

name: Quickom
description: QUICKOM - the leading technology platform for  live-class teaching and lecture hall-based conferences.

name: Rewards Tally
description: The Rewards Tally plugin provides a block to display the achievement points, or reward points, accumulated by the user and the user communities associated with the school or institution. 'User communities' could mean year groups, 'houses' or any other logical grouping used at the school.

name: Self cohort
description: This plugins allow users to self register themselves as cohort members to a list of cohorts pre-selected by the site administrators.

name: Associated input
description: An associated profile field, associates its value with a core optional profile field.

name: Dynamic Dropdown menu
description: This plugin is Course custom field Plugin and provides a new dynamic select/multi-select type custom field that takes input as SQL query and makes the select field based on the output of SQL query.

name: Course contents
description: Course contents block displays a list of all visible sections (such as topics or weeks) in the course. Clicking at a link scrolls to that section or displays just that particular section, depending on the course layout setting.

name: iAssign
description:
iAssign (Interactive Assignment) package aims to enhance activities in Moodle, allowing the incorporation of
"Interactive Learning Modules" (iLM) to Moodle.
iAssign also provides: an area to teachers cooperate (Block); a filter to incorporate any iLM in any Moodle text (Filter); and a TinyMCE editor button (TinyMCE Plugin).
Attention: in order to proper work, iAssign needs its associated packages - block, filter, and editor (please, get all of them).

name: iyzico Payment
description: Enroll users via iyzico payment gateway

name: Stamp collection
description: The Stamp collection module allows a teacher to give "stamps" (i.e. picture with a comment, similar concept to badges) to students so they collect these stamps. The activity can be used in many ways, such as motivative bonus marks, absence marks, certification records etc.

name: OpenMeetings
description: OpenMeetings is a free browser-based software that allows you to set up instantly a conference in the Web. You can use your microphone and/or webcam, share documents on a white board, discuss in a chat, share your screen or record meetings. It is available as hosted service or you download and install a package on your own server.

name: Advanced Notifications
description: Easily create, manage and display notifications/alerts to users.

name: Akamai Media Services tokenized stream protection
description: Filter plugin that enables viewing SMP protected HLS media stream delivered by Akamai Media Services

name: Time
description: Time is a Moodle block to show the time and date to the user using an analogue clock.

name: JSignature
description: A field type for Moodle database activities that allows on-screen signatures (using jSignature)

name: JazzQuiz
description: JazzQuiz lets the teacher run a preplanned quiz, but with the power of improvisation. Several improvise questions are included, which lets you quickly run a multichoice or short answer question during the quiz. You can also start a vote on the students' responses. After the session, you can review the responses for each question (even repolls). You can also download reports for attendance or responses in CSV.

name: Annotate PDF advanced
description: This plugin is a fork of assignfeedback_editpdf, and is developed and maintained by RISET/University of Lausanne. It allows to use several types of customizable tools: simple annotation, comment, stamp, highlighting, margin annotation, chained annotations.

name: Environment Ribbons
description: This plugin allows you to set ribbons in the 4 corners of your site, displaying either static text, or dynamic text driven from a script.

name: Content translation manager
description: The Content translation filter provides a way to quickly translate the content of Moodle courses into different languages.

name: Migrate content from mod_hvp to mod_h5pactivity
description: Moodle plugin allowing to migrate activities created with the mod_hvp plugin created by Joubel to the new mod_h5pactivity created by Moodle HQ since Moodle 3.9.

name: StrikePlagiarism.com
description:
Strikeplagiarism.com is a commercial plagiarism detection system which requires a paid subscription to use.

To use this plugin you must purchase a subscription from www.strikeplagiarism.com

name: Question Usage Statistics
description: That is a report plugin that helps the admin to known how the Moodle question types are being used by users (e.g. as essay, true/false, etc).

name: Bulk Email
description: This is an admin tool plugin for Moodle 3.9+ which adds an action to bulk user actions allowing you to send emails to a list of users.

name: Changelog Lib
description: This plugin provides helper methods to handle the backup process of files which are required for a changelog generation.

name: Badge Awarder
description: This block allows teachers to quickly and simply award badges in a given course by processing a CSV file upload.

name: One Roster
description: A OneRoster enrolment plugin for Moodle, supporting version 1.1 of the IMS OneRoster REST specification.

name: Learning Object Relation Discovery (LORD)
description: This plugin determines the similarity between all the learning activities in a course and uses the similarity to configure a network graph of the activities.

name: Thai Buddhist Calendar Type
description: Moodle calendar type for Thai Buddhist year

name: Hijri calendar type
description: This plugin provides Hijri calendar support for Moodle

name: Persian calendar
description: This plugin provides Jalali calendar support for Moodle

name: Rebel
description: Radically different, beautifully executed, and intelligently designed.  Rebel is a unique and modern Boost-based theme that isn't afraid to be simple.  Rebel's intuitive layout is a refreshing take on a modern LMS where the focus is on learning.

name: Book from znanium.com
description: This plugin is intended for use with russian digital library system Znanium. Course module is representing single book. Module allows to view books without authentification on external site.

name: Courses to Calendar
description: Display all your courses in the Calendar as Site Events from selected categories. Sometimes and for some reasons, you want to display to everyone your courses in the Calendar and this is exactly what this plugin does.

name: Authentication on znanium.com site
description: This block is intended for use with russian electronic library znanium.com (paid subscription or demo subscription required)

name: Upload page activities completions
description: A tool to allow import of completion results for Page activities using a text delimited file.

name: Email OTP
description: Email One-Time Password Authentication.

name: Notetaker
description: A simple notetaker activity that allows a student to create notes within a course.

name: Menutopic format
description: Course format that allows you to display the topics/sections in a menu.

name: Visitor Counter
description: It displays a visitor counter in a block.

name: Weather
description: Weather is a Moodle block to show the realtime weather of the user using the geolocation.

name: Dates
description: This 'report' is actually a tool to let you edit all the dates in a course on one page.

name: Workflow block
description: This block allows you to manage the process of producing courses or activities. A workflow make it clear who is responsible for doing the next step, and what tasks they should be doing. The workflow can also assign and unassign roles, or automatically set certain settings, when the workflow moves from one step to the next.

name: Manual grading by student
description: A quiz 'report' add-on for Moodle, like the nomal manual grading report, but which lets you grade one student at a time, rather than one question at a time.

name: Combined
description: A Moodle question type which allows questions to be built up from parts that are other simpler question types (requires you to have these question types installed)

name: Pattern match
description: Allows a short response of one or a few sentences that is graded by comparing against various model answers, which are described using the OU's pattern match syntax.

name: OU multiple response
description: The main difference from the standard Moodle multiple choice question type is in the way that grading works. When creating the question, the teacher just indicates which choices are correct. If there are n correct choices, then the student scores 1/n for each correct choice. If they select too many choices, then incorrect choices outweigh correct ones.

name: VideoFront Vídeo
description: Plugin for video library integration with Moodle

name: User Restore
description:
The Sebsoft User Restore Plugin offers you the possibility to restore user accounts
that were deleted from moodle.

name: Block Fast Navigation
description: Block fastnav gives users the ability to navigate more easily inside a course.

name: Anti-hammering / Login blocker
description:
The Sebsoft Anti Hammering Authentication Plugin offers you the possibility to prevent hammering your login system.
This plugin can be configured to "smart detect" so called hammering on IP basis or for users in general.

name: BLC Modules
description: The BLC Modules block allows teachers to easily browse and insert Blended Learning Consortium SCORM packages into their course. You must be subscribed to the BLC repository in order for this plugin to function. More information can be found on http://blc-fe.org.

name: Export quiz attempts
description: This quiz report allows you to get view of a quiz attempt that is formatted for easy printing. This can either be a blank attempt for students to write in their responses, if they cannot attempt the quiz online, or a review of a finished quiz attempt.

name: Course module competency report
description: Reports based on course module competencies to offer students and teachers a better user experience for competencies in activities ratings.

name: Course module competency rating
description: The main goal of this plugin is to allow ratings in course module competency.

name: CUL Activity Stream
description: Local plugin which sends messages when a course activity/resource is added or updated. Part of the CUL Activity Stream suite.

name: CUL Activity Stream
description: Message output plugin required by block CUL Activity Steam. Part of the CUL Activity Stream suite.

name: Wooflash
description: Wooflash helps teachers to follow their students' progress at anytime and from a distance, and students to revise learning material more effectively.

name: HTML5 canvas sketch game
description: a Moodle activity for making html5 canvas sketches.

name: Upload external content courses
description: Provides a bulk upload tool to create Moodle Courses that consist of a single External Content Activity, the information is loaded from a Text Delimited File

name: Easy Enrollments
description: Get students from the homepage to learning in seconds using 6 digit enrollment codes or a QR Code.  This plugin is part of a set.  For best results please install Fordson version 1.4.4 or newer.

name: Adaptive mode (multi-part questions)
description: A question behaviour designed for use by qtype_stack.

name: Lesson Essay Feedback
description: The Lesson essay feedback block will display (to the students only) their previous attempts at Lesson Essays (if any), together with the teacher's comments and their grade (if essays have been graded).

name: MEDIAL TinyMCE Editor
description: In order for the MEDIAL Video Assignment Activity to launch from the text editor you must install this TinyMCE Plugin. MEDIAL Video Assignment Activity allows Teachers and Students to create and respond to Video Assignments that are uploaded and cataloged in MEDIAL (a video streaming media library) rather than Moodle itself

name: Question search by question type
description: This is a moodle local plugin to put a question type filter on "adding question from question bank" screen.

name: Microsoft OneDrive document converter
description: Converts files to pdf using Microsoft OneDrive.

name: QR code
description: A Moodle block to display a QR code link that leads to the course page. The QR code can be downloaded by teachers, e.g. to put them into introductory slides. A custom logo can be shown within the QR code.

name: Media collection
description: This plugin allows instructors/teachers to create a space for students to submit "galleries". These galleries can be based on images, audio or video.

name: User favourites / favorite / bookmark
description: Marking Moodle pages as user favourites.

name: Enrolment audit
description: This plugin enables tracking the history of learner enrolments at site and course level.

name: Fair Allocation
description:
This Module lets you add an activity to courses, in which users can rate choices. You may then distribute the users fairly to the choices by maximizing overall 'happiness' in terms of ratings.
This may be an alternative to the choice activity or first-come-first-served.

name: Giphy
description: Moodle plugin for using of Giphy.com as repository

name: IPA
description: The Moodle IPA Filter displays X-SAMPA as unicode IPA. The intent is to offer an easy and fast way to display the International Phonetic Alphabet in Moodle.

name: Media Poster
description:
Activity module that displays a page with several blocks that can have different types of content. Among which there can be our File block.  Can fetch its metadata from ResourceSpace.
Dependencies:
ResourceSpace  website (optional, to fetch metadata)
ResourceSpace  repository plugin (optional)
Docuementation and Download:
https://github.com/iorobertob/moodle-mod_mposter

name: Simple calculator
description: Simple calculator block for moodle to do simple calculations.

name: Theme selector
description: Provides a quick way of changing themes or clearing the theme cache.

name: Course Merge Helper
description: This local module allows teachers to create a new course shell from existing courses using the Course Meta Link enrollment method.

name: Level up! Availability
description: Restrict access to course content until students reach the required level.

name: Configurable Reports
description:
This block is a Moodle custom reports builder.

You can create custom reports without SQL knowledge. It's a tool suitable for admins or teachers.

name: Heatmap
description: The Heatmap block overlays a heatmap onto a course to highlight activities with more or less activity to help teachers improve their courses.

name: Leganto reading list
description: The Leganto reading list module enables a teacher to include a selection of citations from associated Leganto reading lists directly within the content of their course. Please note that this integration plugin depends on a paid subscription to the ExLibris Leganto reading lists service (see http://www.exlibrisgroup.com/category/Leganto for details).

name: Registration
description: Teachers can create some examination dates. They define date, time, and place of the examination. Furthermore they define maximum number of students and maximum number of points. After the registration date, they define the points for each student. These can be printed with or without student names. Each student can register/unregister only himself/herself.

name: Question trends
description: It lets you see trends in your scorm activity

name: Multi-Language Content (v2)
description:
This filter is a greatly simplified multi-language filter. It uses very simple non-HTML tags to mark multi-language blocks. Namely {mlang XX} {mlang} pairs, where XX is the Moodle short name for the language pack (i.e., en, fr, eu, es, es_mx, etc.)


It uses the same tags as the filter_multilangsecond plugin (to be compatible with it), but there is one difference between the two. This filter allows standalone {mlang} tags that don't require adjoining alternative language tags. This makes the filter more flexible at the cost of potentially producing empty sets of  tags.

name: Advanced spam cleaner
description: Advanced Spam Cleaner tool for Moodle

name: Link crawler robot
description: An admin tool robot crawler which scans your moodle for broken, large or slow links.

name: Elastic
description:
This plugin allows Moodle to use Elasticsearch as the search engine for Moodle's Global Search.
The following features are provided by this plugin:  Multiple versions of Elasticsearch,  File indexing,  Request signing, compatible with Amazon Web Services (AWS),  Respects Moodle Proxy settings, Image recognition and webservices.

name: Topics activity cards format
description: Very simple course format which overrides the topics format to display activities as cards.

name: Styles
description: Moodle Atto plugin which lets the administrator provide custom CSS classes which can afterwards be applied by users to block and inline text in Atto

name: Mediasite Content Module for Moodle
description: Integrate Mediasite content in a Moodle course.

name: Edumeet
description: eduMeet WebRTC Moodle Plugin. This module is the successor of mod_multipartymeeting.

name: Download essay submissions
description: Moodle Quiz Report Plugin for downloading essay submissions.

name: alfaview classroom
description:
alfaview is an app based video conferencing system (https://alfaview.com).
This plugin integrates the alfaview video conferencing capabilities with Moodle.

name: Journal
description: This module allows a teacher to ask students to reflect on a particular topic. The students can edit and refine their answer over time.

name: Suspend User
description: This plugin suspends user accounts based on a csv file with email addresses. Access is controlled by a capability.

name: Social Comments
description: The social comments block plugin for Moodle increases engagement by fostering peer learning through comment subscription, email digests, comments newsfeed, comment search and pinning of important comments and content to the pin board. This plugin is part of a collection of open source plugins, which all have the goal to improve the overall usability/ user experience of Moodle.

name: Moodle eMail Test
description: Moodle eMailTest allows administrators to test Moodle's email system. A trace of the SMTP dialogue will be displayed if the email message cannot be sent for any reason. The eMail Test for Moodle plugin does not store any personal data about any user.

name: Course Archiving
description: This plugin archives or delete courses from chosen categories depending on their start date.

name: Safe Exam Browser access rule (quizaccess_seb) for Moodle 3.7 and 3.8
description: Plugin to integrate Safe Exam Browser into the quiz activity in Moodle.

name: Synchronize groups
description:
With this plugin you can synchronize groups and groups members between two courses,
in a way that a course A will be a mirror of course B.

Only users that are already enrolled are added as group members.

name: Pattern match with molecular editor
description: A question type where the user enters their response using the JavaScript Molecular Editor, and the response is then graded using the OU's pattern-match algorithm.

name: Auto Group
description:
A local plugin which automatically assigns enrolled users on a course into groups
dependant upon information within their user profile. (Now with custom profile field support - called User Info Field in settings.)

This plugin will create, update, and delete groups automatically
to match the users on your course. All behaviour is event-driven
and so will occur within page loads.

The system can also monitor manual group setting changes and
moderate them to ensure that groups are kept neat and tidy.

name: Sketch
description: Simple image "paint like" editor for tinymce.

name: Sketch
description: Simple image "paint like" editor for atto.

name: Enrol Stats
description: An Enrolment Stats list, that can be viewed by admin or the the person who has capability at the category level with a category drop down filter.

name: Flickr public (Xpert)
description:
The 'Flickr public (Xpert)' repository allows a user to attribute an image returned via the Flickr API to the copyright holder.  This is restricted to images licensed under the Creative Commons "Attribution CC BY" license.

This is accomplished by appending the copyright notice below the image itself.

name: Upload and attribute a file (Xpert)
description: The 'Upload and attribute a file (Xpert)' repository allows a user to attribute an uploaded image to the copyright holder

name: URL downloader (Xpert)
description: The 'URL downloader (Xpert)' repository allows a user to attribute an image downloaded via a URL to the copyright holder

name: Notify site administrators about new Email Signups
description:
This plugin sends an email notification message to the 'Support email' address every time a new Moodle user account is created via the 'Email signup' authentication plugin. The notification message contains some essential details about the account just created (email address, full name and user account name).

The email is sent when the user signs up, not when the user account is confirmed. So the plugin will notify even about accounts that may never be confirmed.

name: PagSeguro
description:
Este plugin de inscrição permite que você venda seus cursos no Moodle através do PagSeguro.
This plugins allow you to setup paid courses using the PagSeguro service.

name: PBLTool (CLPMTool)
description: This  block  implements a project management tool create to be used with collaborative learning. It is integrated with group forum and chat. The main ideia is that students and teacher plan ther activities together.

name: Group formation
description: Formation of optimized learning groups - by topic preference or best match of individuals' charatceristics and preferences; in one easy to use Moodle acticity;  languages available: German, English

name: Toggle preview
description: An Atto editor plugin that shows a preview of the filtered editor content.

name: Webservice manage sections
description: Webservice Manage Sections allows you to manage the section structure of a moodle course via REST API. You can create, delete and move sections. Furthermore you can get the sectionsettings (name, summary, visibility, section format options, ... ) and update them.

name: Automatic enrolment in groups
description: Plugin to auto enrol users in Moodle courses groups

name: Unique dashboard
description: Create customized dashboard with multi columns or tiled look for all employees or different ones for each departments!

name: E-Voting
description: The E-Voting activity module enables students to vote via their smartphone or their laptop and to have the results displayed on a graph in real time.

name: Semester overview
description: In the semsort block (blocks/semester_sortierung), courses are grouped by their starting dates in a semester view on the MyMoodle page.

name: User related debugmode
description: With this plugin you can define the debugmode for only some selected users.

name: Upload Single Page Courses
description: This admin tool will bulk create course with a single Page activity from a text delimted file.

name: Disable Right Click
description: Plugin helps to disable Right Click(Context Menu), Cut, Copy, Paste and developer tools.

name: Set course dates
description: This admin tool allows managers to set the start and end dates for all courses in a category, including subcategories.

name: Ensemble Video filter
description: Along with the Ensemble Video Moodle Repository Plugin, this plugin makes it easier for Moodle users to add videos and playlists to content without having to navigate to Ensemble Video and copy/paste complicated embed codes. This plugin filters content to render urls added by the repository plugin as Ensemble Video embed codes.

name: Ensemble Video repository
description: Along with the Ensemble Video Moodle Filter Plugin, this plugin makes it easier for Moodle users to add videos and playlists to content without having to navigate to Ensemble Video and copy/paste complicated embed codes. Once setup, you should see an additional repository option under Insert Moodle media in the Moodle content editor, enabling you to choose videos or playlists from the configured Ensemble Video installation.

name: Roshnilite
description: Roshni Lite Moodle Theme is a 100% responsive, feature heavy beautiful Moodle theme. It is compatible with the latest Moodle 3.8.1. It provides customizable sections on the front page which the user may customize through a backend setting panel, can add/update/delete content.

name: Masked field
description: This plugin allows the admin create user profile fields with custom masks.

name: Restriction by course progress
description: This plugin allows teachers to add activities with restriction based on the student course completion progress.

name: Simple CSV format
description: A simple format for easy and fast creating multiple choice questions with one or more correct answers and no feedback using tables in any spreadsheet by saving it as plain/csv file.

name: Myddleware - Your open source data integration tool
description:
Myddleware for Moodle enables you to transfer your data easily and safely from your Moodle application to other applications such as your e-commerce, CRM or messaging tools. By doing so, it ensures a durable quality of your data, which is a prerequisite for productivity and efficiency. 

Connected applications : SalesForce, SugarCRM, SuiteCRM, Sage CRM, SAP CRM, Sage Live, Hubspot, Zuora, Magento, Prestashop, Mailchimp, Dolist, MySQL, Microsoft SQL, FTP...

name: Edwiser Site Monitor
description: Edwiser Site Monitor lets you stay on top, tracking everything that matters to your Moodle, all at one place.

name: modedit
description: Provides edit and delete links to all activities and resources on a page. This is useful if there's some content that has broken the page layout.

name: Export Glossary to Quiz
description: A block to export a Glossary's entries to the Quiz Questions bank.

name: Fail grade
description: A quiz access rule to prevent extra attempts after the user reach a passing grade

name: Webservice get roles
description:
This local plugin allows you to get moodles roles via REST API. There is no possibility to get role ids directly via rest api, 
though there are two core functions demanding for role id: core_role_assign_roles and core_role_unassign_roles.

name: Global CSV feeding for Moodle
description:
This plugin concentrates all CSV based approaches for feeding massively Moodle
with initialisations as courses, users, and enrollements, completing all 
existing mechanisms with missing parts (cron automation, failure reports, tryback files, archiving, CSV files repository and selection, instant upload and run).

name: Buttons
description:
Buttons is a course format that creates a menu with buttons to access the sections, one by one. 
Please favourite ♥!

name: Safe Exam Browser quiz access rule
description: This quiz access rule plugin provides Safe Exam Browser 2.0 integration for Moodle

name: WebEx Meeting
description: A Moodle activity module for Cisco WebEx.

name: Authorize.net
description:
Enrolment in Moodle using Authorize.net payment gateway for paid courses

This plugin helps admins and webmasters use Authorize.net as the payment gateway. Authorze.net is one of the most commonly used payment gateways and offers considerable number of features unsupported by other payment gateways like Paypal. This plugin has all the settings for development as well as for production usage. Its easy to install, set up and effective.

name: YuJa Media Chooser
description: Enables Moodle users to embed YuJa Enterprise Video Platform-hosted media content within Moodle

name: Grades sorter
description: A moodle plugin to add a block to course providing a button to automatically sort grades in the same order than activities

name: Attendance
description: This block works with the attendance module, it provides teachers with quick access to Attendance functionality, and provides students quick access to a summary report for their own attendance.

name: Multiselect menu
description: This plugin is a new multiselect profile inspired from the existing select customfield (customfield/field/select). Several choices can be selected using the usual multiselect form (autocomplete).

name: Hyperlink to book from znanium.com
description: This plugin is intended for use with russian digital library system Znanium. Plugin allows to insert links to books in html-area. Page in book can be specified. Module allows to view books without authentification on external site.

name: Boost Mega Menu (Bootstrap 4)
description: Enhance Boost and Boostrap 4 compatible themes with a mega menu to display courses.

name: Drag-and-Drop Matching
description: Question type similar to the matching question type but with a drag and drop interface for the students during attempt.

name: CAS server (SSO) with user-attribute release
description: A CAS (SSO) authentication module for Moodle that uses released attributes rather than LDAP for user information.

name: Module Usage Statistics
description: That is a report plugin that helps the admin to known how the Moodle modules are being used by users (e.g. as forum, as file repositories or as activities repositories).

name: Courses Usage Statistics
description: That is a Moodle report plugin that helps the admin to known how the courses are being used by users (e.g. as forum, as file repositories or as activities repositories).

name: MoodleNet
description: Admin tool to enable the integration of Moodle 3.7 & 3.8 to MoodleNet

name: kuraCloud
description:
Connect Moodle with your kuraCloud instance. (Requires a paid kuraCloud subscription)
This block allows a Moodle course to be mapped to a kuraCloud course. Student accounts are synchronised from Moodle to kuraCloud and grades are synchronised back from kuraCloud to Moodle.

name: Media gallery
description: This plugin allows users to insert a pre-existing media collection gallery into any atto editor.

name: Media collection submissions
description: This plugin allows instructors/teachers to make media collections a gradable activity by leveraging the assign activity.

name: Team Builder
description: Developed by UNSW, this is an advanced tool for building teams based off a set of criteria. You ask your students some questions, and then develop a predicate based off their answers for your teams. This is great if you want a little more control than "Assign Randomly" but less work than "Manual Allocation".

name: Simple course creator
description: This tool allows users to create a course with minimum or allowed options.

name: Multiblock
description:
Using Multiblock you can collect all those blocks together and use 'one block's
worth' of space and put all those blocks into the one space with one of several
layouts, whether it's tabs or an accordion, or something else. Several preset
layouts are bundled with Multiblock.

name: Multi select menu custom user profile field
description:
A multiselect menu as a custom user profile field for Moodle.

How it could be useful:
This new custom profile field type could be used in many cases like:
1. You have to differentiate users into groups and one user could be part of multiple groups
2. You want to take inputs from user at the time of registration or you manually want to fill some information for users like education, certificates they have done.
3. There could be various other cases like this,

name: Interactive with explanation
description: This behaviour is like the interactive with multiple attempts behaviour , but with an additional text box where students can give a reason why they gave the answer they did.

name: My Students
description: A block to display all the students of a teacher (compiling the students of all its courses)

name: Formulas question type
description: This is a question type plugin for Moodle with random values and multiple answer fields.

name: Collapsible Weeks format
description: The collapsible weeks format is a clone of the core topics format that adds collapsing behaviour to sections in order to reduce page size.

name: Activity track
description: This block show the total no. of activities pending and completed in percentage and number in a course where course completion is activated.

name: Collapsible Topics format
description: The collapsible topics format is a clone of the core topics format that adds collapsing behaviour to sections in order to reduce page size.

name: Collaborative Folders
description: Enhance collaboration by providing shared folders to your students automatically. No need to collect Dropbox or ownCloud e-mail addresses anymore: Just add it to a course and select the groups that should collaborate. ownCloud/Nextcloud will privately share one folder per group to its members!

name: Data privacy
description: Provides the workflow for users to submit subject access requests and for site administrators and privacy officers to process these requests.

name: Remote courses block
description: This block prints a list of courses from another Moodle instance. It is designed for use with the Remote course web service local plugin.

name: Markdown dataformat
