name: Virtual Keyboard
description: Virtual keyboard is a TinyMCE editor add-on.

name: Periods format
description:
This course format allows to set duration for each section (period) in days, weeks, months or years. Each individual section (period) may override this duration.
The course settings allow automatically collapse or hide past or future periods.

name: Table of Contents Generator
description: Automatically generated table of contents for a page of content.

name: NED - Marking Manager
description: This block allows teachers to grade assignments, quizzes and forums within a single interface.

name: eduMessenger
description: eduMessenger is an instant messenger that's main purpose is connecting students and teachers in educational environments! eduMessenger uses Moodle as a background-tool to provide the messaging functionality to anyone who hosts their own Moodle instance as a basement for their groups and data.

name: Auto activate quiz attempt button access rule
description: The “Activate Attempt” plugin makes the “Attempt quiz now” button auto-appear at quiz open timing without requiring to refresh the page.

name: String override
description: Makes it possible for plugins to override existing translations regardless if they're bundled with Moodle or they're originated from a community plugin.

name: Merge PDF Files
description: The ‘Merge PDF Files’ plugin offers the user a convenient way by which they can merge the files (only PDF documents) in a Moodle course.

name: Aardvark
description: The original 'menubar' based theme for Moodle, evolved for the modern student. NO LONGER BEING DEVELOPED

name: Pinned Users
description: This plugiin allow you to pinned users in a lock

name: Get User Cohort
description: This plugin can be used to retrieve the cohorts of a given user in Moodle by providing the USER ID

name: NED - Mentor Manager
description: With this block, the admin (or designated user) can assign mentors to students.  Mentors can then access easy-to-read “progress reports” for their mentees.  The admin (or designated users) can also create automated notifications that are sent to teachers, mentors or students based on pre-selected criteria (example: notification is emailed to mentor and student if student has not logged in for 7 days).

name: PLAGIARISMA
description: PLAGIARISMA is a commercial product owned by Plagiarisma.Net - you must have a paid subscription to be able to use this plugin. The plugin works for the assignment module, with file submissions and online text.

name: Tuteur
description: Help tutor's action by colorizing new student's response.

name: Contemporary
description: A bright and responsive theme especially designed for academic and corporate use.

name: Morecandy
description: Morecandy is a simple theme based on the More theme, but contains a different look to the expanded block titles.

name: Stash snippets
description: Filter plugin to make the usage of the block "Stash" a lot easier!

name: MindMap Format
description:
Mindmap Course Format  allows Moodle users using courses through interactive, personalized mindmap.
Additionally, it provides features unavailable in standard Moodle, which are: graphical presentation of conditional dependencies and distinction of modules where student have problems (and which are near deadline).

name: Nextcloud
description: Enable users to upload files from their private storage directly into Moodle. Supports Nextcloud and ownCloud!

name: Mass enrolments
description: A tool to all teachers to enrol existing users to their courses using CSV files (without bothering the admins)

name: Course slider
description: A simple course slider block that displays a chosen list of courses in a carousel.

name: Flexpage format
description: Moodlerooms is proud to release Flexpage, a course format that provides a teacher with complete control over how educational materials and assessments are presented to a student.

name: Flexpage Activity
description: Moodlerooms is proud to release the Flexpage Activity block, which allows the Flexpage course format to embed activities into different regions of the page.

name: Flexpage Menu
description: Moodlerooms is proud to release the Flexpage Menu Block, a helper block that is used by the Flexpage course format to display Flexpage menus. The Flexpage Menu block is required for the Flexpage course format to work properly.

name: Flexpage Theme
description: Moodlerooms is proud to release the Flexpage Theme, which allows for the new and improved layout in the Flexpage course format

name: Credly
description: A moodle block to integrate with the Credly Open Credit API

name: Enhanced Choice
description: Based upon the Choice activity, an Enhanced Choice enables a teacher to ask a single question and offer a selection of possible media rich responses (instead of just text).

name: Telegram
description: This plugin provides a Moodle message output for Telegram. Users can configure the plugin to send Moodle notifications through a Telegram Bot and channel.

name: Slack message processor
description: This plugin provides a Moodle message output for Slack. Sites can select a Slack team, and users can connect their Moodle notifications to their Slack account for that team.

name: Inno Ed Tools
description: The plugin is allowing you to collect statistics standard tag that is used to refer to the blog entry on each course and display the results in a report. You can also export it as a pdf file. It also has a feature to convert url links to QR code while export to gain direct access to specified link  from a smart phone or other device.

name: IntelliBoard
description: Designed as a Moodle block, the IntelliBoard Block provides immediate course and/or activity data to a Moodle user.  Depending on preferred configuration, Moodle users can see course and activity completion, visits, time spent, grades and more.

name: Leap Builder
description: This module can create models of learning plans and helps to find optimal from ones.

name: Profile Field Identifier
description: A plugin to prompt users to fill their optional & custom profile fields.

name: Sharp
description: A simple, sleek look with a variety of contrasting colors for personal, professional or academic use.

name: Dynamic
description: A lively responsive theme with sections on the homepage, especially suitable for academic and personal use.

name: Course Finder
description: A plugin to search courses in Moodle.

name: Course Status Tracker
description: A plugin to track the status of enrolled & completed course of student.

name: Grade Book
description: This moodle plugin has the goal of improve usability when setting grades in Moodle. Moodle API provides an input where you can write your math expressions and that is difficult to some teachers. Therefore we are developing this plugin in order to make easier this process using a web interface.

name: Homework
description: The Homework Block streamlines the process of managing homework activities by simplifying the way teachers set, track and mark their student’s homework. Homework Block not only provides benefits to teachers but also the students, school and parents too.

name: Inspire
description: The Inspire plugin implements open source, transparent next-generation learning analytics using machine learning backends that go beyond simple descriptive analytics to provide predictions of learner success, and ultimately diagnosis and prescriptions (advisements) to learners and teachers. From Moodle HQ.

name: Algolia
description:
This plugin provides Algolia integration for Moodle's Global Search.

Algolia is a hosted Search as a Service provider making it easy for websites to integrate search without any need to install/maintain additional servers.

It currently offers a free plan with 10k records and 100k API calls per month.

name: Signup
description: This enrolment plugin lets you enrol users in the desired courses when they sign up to Moodle.

name: WordPress authentication
description: WordPress OAuth 1.0a three legged authentication for Moodle 3.1+

name: Mask
description: Transform PDF documents into interactive activities in a snap

name: FlexiBase
description:
This is the flexibase theme for Moodle. It is a Bootstrap3 theme, but uses flexbox to create the layouts, rather than the bootstrap grid.
This theme depends upon Bas Brands' bootstrap theme for bootstrap3.

name: Ranking block
description: A ranking block to improve the gamification into the course.

name: Public files
description: A clone of the internal private_files block that is at the system rather than user context. Files added to this block are available everywhere the block is visible (to all logged on users).

name: List course files
description: This extension allows teachers to view a list of all files in a course and to change the license for each file. It is also possible to download the files in a ZIP archive.

name: Adding authentication to links on www.iprbookshop.ru
description: This block is intended for use with russian electronic library www.iprbookshop.ru (paid subscription or demo subscription required)

name: Authentication on www.iprbookshop.ru site
description: This block is intended for use with russian electronic library www.iprbookshop.ru (paid subscription or demo subscription required)

name: External disclaimer
description: A Moodle plugin to add a disclaimer popup when users click on an external link on your site.

name: Lesson Export EPUB
description: This plugin allows lesson modules to be exported to EPUB documents.

name: Set splitting question
description: The splitset question is alike a matrix question but with simpler model. Il allows layouting a serie of questions with a common set of possible answers (f.e. yes/no, allowed/not allowed, less/more/equal ...).

name: Video chat
description: The Video chat block allows users in the same course to have video chat using WebRTC. It supports openandtalk.com and other video chat service.

name: JW Player multimedia filter

This is vi for Moodle. No really - it works!

Why? Why not ?

Our technology analyzes the statements collected using machine learning algorithms and builds dashboards analysis with consolidated user information.

the Pagemenu module is now maintained at Edunao.com (French Moodle Partner)

the "page format" is a very flexible course format allowing building a hierarchical course with nested pages organisation and a totally floxeible way of compositing the course with blocs and activities placed anywhere in the three-or-less-columns layout.

Additionnally it proposes a new richer way to integrate activities in course, with "alternate views" that changes the historical [ "icon" + Link ] display. Some standard activities will have some alternate available views, and we still receive suggestions about how could some activites have an "enriched" display in the course pages.  

The page format is now maintained by ActiveProLearn (France)

Added features include:
- Every user now have a separate mindmap in one single activity, with links to view others' mindmap.
- Dummy group mode: multiple mindmaps with simple group name that everyone can view and edit (for group mindmapping without having to setup groups in the course) 
- Lock mindmap: prevent editing of mindmap when someone is editing it during group mindmapping

Currently, it is not backward compatible with Moodle 1.9x, please install it on Moodle 2.x only.

name: Assignments Block
description: A plugin for the learning platform Moodle that shows graded and open assignments in one block.

name: Codeposty SMS Sender
description: Codespoty sends SMS from moodle using the SMS services of www.codeposty.ir and it is based on the SMS platforms of Iran.

name: Linked Checkbox
description: The database linked checkbox field is an enhanced version of the current checkbox field that allows the individual values in the checkboxes to show as hyperlinks when the record is displayed. Clicking the hyperlinks will display a filtered search result based on the checkbox value.

name: Tag input
description: The database tags field creates tags from comma separated text, similar to the way that Moodle generates tags from the 'Interests' field in the User Profile, but specifically for the database activity. When a record is displayed these are hyperlinked and when clicked will display a filtered search result based on the tag value.

name: Database Tags
description: The database tags block is a block that will display a tag cloud in a course. You can select any database instance within a course, and choose any checkbox, linked checkbox or database tag fields within those databases to be shown in the block. This is NOT linked to the Moodle Tags block- it only shows the tags created by the two new database fields.

name: Legacy files migration
description: This plugin is designed in order to migrate legacy course files to private files area for a choosen user

name: Educacionbe
description: This is the theme of Educacionbe moodle OnLine. It is based on the bootstrap and allows extensive customization and some unique to help improve the usability of Moodle features. Rediceñado with CSS3 all menus and buttons links. The theme includes bar menu based on Moodle. If you like it, please show some love by clicking "favourite" ( ♥ ) below!

name: Statistics (Graph Stats)
description: Little graph with visitors statistics

name: GURLS
description: This plugin will dynamically replace a URL (example: www.black.com) with an alternate URL (example: www.blue.com) based on front page group membership.  More info here: http://northernlinks.ca/docs/GURLS_Manual.pdf

name: Bootswatch
description:
This is a child theme for Bootstrap3, it allows site administrators to select a Bootswatch. A Bootswatch is a sub-theme for Bootstrap based themes. The bootswatches used on this theme are created by Tomas Park, see http://bootswatch.com/. 
A Bootswatch contains the variables en settings for styling Bootstrap themes, they are easy to create and maintain.

name: cerulean
description: This is a bootswatch theme for Moodle 2.7 and Bootstrap3

name: Multi Course Grader report
description: Site Wide grader reports on one page with the ability to filter by course category / course.  No editing functionality.

name: Sitewide User report
description: Site wide user report which can be filtered by course category or course

name: Camo
description: Moodle Filter to convert images to route through a camo proxy server

name: Retrieve Title and Teaserimage from webpage via url
description:
This Filter is required for the Socialwall Course Format.

The Moodle Socialwall will transform your Moodle course into a social learning platform.  This includes a familiar post interface, timeline of posts, filtering of the timeline, and integration with Moodle's activities and resources.  A social learning format allows teachers to pick up the tool and begin using it right away.

name: Multi-lingual Content
description:
This filter is a more flexible version of multilang filter. One of three possible choices can be selected by the filter admin setting: HTML syntax, Non HTML syntax or
Both. If the non html syntax is chosen language block looks like: {mlang en}English{mlang}{mlang bg}Bulgarian{mlang}. In case of Html syntax, language block is a sequence of identical html tags with lang="XX" attributes span or div or any other.

name: Autoenrol Parents
description: Auto assign parents, mentors or managers a role to users based on a custom profile field.

name: Record Audio
description: Allows audio recordings to be made and uploaded/inserted anywhere that files can be picked from repositories - including via the "Moodle Media" button in the WYSIWYG editor.

name: Computer science editor
description:
Computer science equation editor plugin for Moodle 2.7, or later, using either the TeX or MathJax filter.

Designed for UK A Level (post-16) Computing and Computer Science curriculum, but can be easily customised for other levels or content.

name: Chemistry editor
description: Edit chemistry equations in Moodle 2.7, or later, using the mhchem extension to the MathJax or TeX filter. Useful for full and ionic equations, isotopes, equilibrium reactions, thermochemistry and reaction kinetics. Includes a periodic table of element symbols.

name: Matrix editor
description: Moodle Atto Editor plugin for TeX/MathJax Matrices and Arrays.

name: evolve-D
description: evolve-D(earborn) is a Moodle theme focused on simplicity and style.  Turn on the custom frontpage and your site will sport an impressive and beautiful login page.  Once logged in you have complete control over the custom homepage complete with a navigation bar with icons, search, text, slideshow, and more.

name: Recent Files Block
description: See recently uploaded or modified files and folders in the course resources from all your courses you are enrolled in and pin them for easier access with this block.

name: Questionmark QML Importer (Alpha)
description: Import Questionmark QML files into the Moodle question bank

name: Timestat
description: Timestat block measures users real activity time. Time is increased only when Moodle tab is active in browser.

name: Bulk meta course link
description: An improved version of enrol_meta plugin which allows you to add multiple courses in a single enrol instance.

name: MediaDrop chooser
description: Allows users to insert media from a MediaDrop platform (formerly known as "MediaCore Community Edition") into the Atto text editor.

name: Ruby / furigana
description: Ruby phonetic support for Atto.

name: Exam
description: Built of people who want to conduct large scale MCQ Quizzes.

name: AJAX Question categories moving
description: Moving Moodle question categories one step at a time is a long known problem. With this plugin you can move them anywhere in one swift move.

name: moodletxt - bbconnecttxt.com SMS/Text Two-Way Messaging Module
description:
moodletxt is a block that allows teachers and administrators to send SMS/text 
messages to their students directly from the Moodle system.  The module supports both inbound and outbound messaging, text message status updates, user-personalised 
messages, message templates and signatures, personal addressbooks, and has full compatibility with user timezones. As of version 3, it also supports event-based messaging via the moodletxt+ message processor.

name: SocialShare
description: Adds social networks buttons to your Moodle

name: Jump To Navigation
description: Adds a Moodle 1.x style "Jump To" menu to Moodle 2.x

name: Random question summary
description: This report allows for the analysis of random questions within a Quiz.

name: Events Graphic Report
description: Manage your moodle using the Events Graphic Reports plugins and see what's happening on your moodle. Browse graphics by course, and see what's the events most triggered, user acitivity and more.

name: VlabEmbed
description:
A Moodle filter plug-in to embed ChemCollective Virtual Lab problems using the Vlab Java applet. It embeds any assigments (both local and global).

This filter will replace links to a Vlab file (.xml) in [vlab]...[/vlab] block with a java applet that plays that ChemCollective Virtual Lab inline.

name: Bootstrap Grid
description: Extends the Atto editor so that bootstrap grids can be inserted into user generated content.

name: Sketchfab Filter
description: Replace Sketchfab image embeds with a 3D viewer

name: Cloudfront URL Signer
description: This Moodle filter recognises cloudfront URLs from the URLs defined in the filter settings and replaces them with signed URLs.

name: i>clicker Moodle integrate
description: This is the Moodle i>clicker integrate plugin which integrates Moodle with iClicker (http://www.iclicker.com/dnn/) The plugin allows students to register their clickers with the Moodle installation.

name: Unanswered Discussions
description: Allows users to see forum discussions that have gone unanswered

name: BCU
description: This is the theme from the moodle site of Birmingham City University. It's based on bootstrap and allows for extensive customisation and some unique features to help improve Moodle's usability.

name: EPUB book export
description: Moodle plugin which adds EPUB v3 export functionality to the Book plugin.

name: OpenIDConnect Management
description: This plugin provides a link in users' profiles to access OpenID Connect management functions.  **This plugin has been replaced by the Microsoft Block**

name: Office 365 Connection
description: This plugin provides a link in users' profiles to access Office 365 management functions. **This plugin has been replaced by the Microsoft Block**

name: Login message
description:
This plugin displays a simple message to users who have visited.

Users can log in, the message changes depending on the time from the last login.

You can change the message language packs.
Improvement plan accepted at any time.

name: Font family
description: A plugin for atto to allow the font family to be altered.

name: Question Filters
description: This plugin enables additional search option within questions in large question banks

name: Drag and drop onto image
description: As of Moodle 3.0, this question type is part of the standard Moodle release. That is why there is no plugin from Moodle 3.x. You don't need one!

name: flowchart
description: Render svg flowcharts using flowcharts.js by Adriano Raiano (http://adrai.github.io/flowchart.js, MIT license), which use raphael.js (MIT licence either)

name: Java Molecular Editor
description:
Question type created by Dan Stowell. 

The student draw a molecule as a response to a question using the  editor and that response is graded by comparing against various model answers.

Old version of the JME question type were using a java applet, but this question type now uses a Javascript applet: JSME. JSME  is a free and Open source molecule editor written in JavaScript.

name: DUK-Reminder
description: A simple block to send out reminders for different tasks from within a course.

name: LinkedinAuth
description: This is the authentication part of the LinkedIn auth plugin. A Linkedin Block provides the user interface for this plugin

name: Font size
description: A plugin for atto to allow the font size to be altered.

name: Media collection embed
description: Allows you to have carousels of a media gallery or galleries displayed in your course in labels and such.

name: My Grades block
description: The my_grades block provides a display of all enrolled courses, overall grades and links to grade reports from the My Home page.

name: Download Certificates (NOW ARCHIVED - SEE NOTES)
description: NOW ARCHIVED - PLEASE SEE NOTES. This block displays all the previously issued certificates without having to go into each course to view them. You will also be able to download the certificates directly without having to go into the course themselves. It will also work for courses that needs to be archived but still want students to be able to download the certificate.

name: Sketchfab for Atto
description: Sketchfab 3d model embedding

name: Goodbye
description: Allows self registred users to delete their account

name: Global Message
description: Enables a Moodle administrator to create automatic pop-up messages

name: SMB Streamline: Tabbed Navigation
description: This is a simple block with no configuration. Simply add it to a Topics or Weeks course set to show all sections on the same page, and it will add a tabbed navigation at the top of the course. This only works on Bootstrap themes.

name: Drag and drop markers
description: The student can drag markers to indicate key features on an image.

name: Drag and drop into text
description: A drag and drop question type where missing words have to be dragged into gaps in a paragraph of text.

name: Select missing words
description: This question type allows students to complete a paragraph of text by selecting the missing words using drop-down menus.

name: UNI Login
description: This plugin allows users to login to moodle using the Danish UNI•Login service

name: Elightenment
description: Elightenment Learning's plugin to allow use of the Elightenment Learning e-commerce service for Moodle course registration.

name: Bookmarks (within book chapter)
description: Bookmarks block plugin provides functionality of user bookmarks creation within the text of Moodle Book chapter (So-called book pins within the text). This can also be used to leave personal notes onto desired locations within Moodle Book chapter.

name: Backup Helper for filter_urlresource
description:
This Local Filter is Required to properly use the Socialwall Course Format.

If your course displays in socialwall format you are able to use a filter called "URL resource filter". This is a new filter that will convert a URL resource type http link that is added and will grab the title and a photo similar to how facebook does from the remote website to display it on the course page.

This plugin is needed to store the data generated by the filter (like alternative title for the url and selected photo) in the course backup.

name: Alerts
description:
This is required by the Socialwall Course Format.
This block is used to indicate any due dates for activities such as an assignment or quizzes that have been added to a course. It is very similar to the standard Upcoming events block (calendar_upcoming) but it would also display any alerts posted by the teacher with its date. Alerts are posts with a special flag normally sent by teachers by using the socialwall format for a course.

name: Concept Map Question Type
description: Question type that allows students to draw and submit a Concept Map as answer

name: Windows Share access (AKA Network Drive Access, SMB Web Client)
description: Access windows shares via a Moodle web interface.

name: Rate a course
description: This block provides an Amazon-style 5 star rating system for courses. Users each give a rating and the total is displayed in the block.

name: Search On Math
description: Just move your mouse over the desired formula, and a button for this search will pop up. More info at searchonmath.com/extensions.

name: Question bank unused questions
description: Extends the Moodle question bank to find questions which are / are not used in a quiz.

name: Mahara Assignment Feedback
description: [For Moodle 2.6] an optional (but recommended!) addition to the Mahara Assignment Submission plugin. This plugin allows Moodle to automatically unlock submitted Mahara portfolio pages & collections after grading.

name: Enrol-Cvent
description: If you're a Cvent customer (cvent.com) and you've got access to their integration API, this enrollment module allows you to get new and updated user accounts and enrollments from Cvent.

name: ECLI
description:
This is a moodle plugin which filters text for ECLI case identifiers, and automatically
links them. Currently it will only take Dutch ECLI identifiers, (prefixed ECLI:NL:) and
links them to the text on http://rechtspraak.nl.

name: Mobile notifications
description:
Message output plugin that enables mobile push notifications in the official Moodle Mobile app.  See http://docs.moodle.org/en/Mobile_app_Push_Notifications for more information

This plugin will be integrated in Moodle core starting version 2.7.

name: AMVONET Room
description: AMVONET is a web conferencing and publishing tool.

name: Simple
description: Simple design, follows the best practice of responsive web design.

name: EasyChem Chemical Structure and Equation Editor
description: Chemical structure and equation editor much like the Moodle equation editor.   Requires filter_easychem.

name: Easychem Chemical Structure and Equation Filter
description: Filter that utilizes Easychem.js to display chemical equations, structures and reactions in HTML5.

name: Search Questions
description: Adds text search to the question bank.

name: SQL Buddy
description: Integration of SQL Buddy for Moodle. Easy and secure MySQL database access and administration.

name: HTML (per group)
description: A simple way to display distinct HTML content to each group within a block.

name: Advance course search
description: Course search plugin is replacement of existing course search with the more better performance & extra features.

name: Drupal Services
description:
Provides session based SSO (Single Sign On) service between Moodle and Drupal. As well as user synchronization capability to import and update users from the Drupal user database. This work is based off the original work of Scott Schaffter and Arsham Skrenes and their module from moodle 1.9
https://moodle.org/mod/data/view.php?d=13&rid=4240&filter=1

name: Emailed Files
description:
Create a Mailbox for your Moodle Instance (e.g. moodle@yourorganization.org / moodleXY@gmail.com).

Users can send mails to this mail-Address and import email-attachments from their mails as files.

name: Search Courses (Autocomplete)
description:
Just enter the first letter of the course you want to search and the auto complete box gives you a list of matching courses with the current word highlighted. The block also has a 'My Courses' feature, when enabled, lets you search only the courses the current user is registered on . 

This block is best used on the 'My Home' page which allows centre positioning of blocks thereby giving you a wider space to see the autocomplete results. 

 

Copyright : University of Bath

name: oohoo - Pop up Dictionary - Block
description:
OOHOO Pop-up Dictionary is a Moodle package that gives the students the possibility to double click on any word within a Moodle HTML resource and retrieve its definition from an online dictionary chosen by the teacher. 

Note that the plugin is separated into two downloads: filter and block.

name: oohoo - Popup Dictionary - Filter
description:
This filter is required for the oohoo Pop-up Dictionary block.

OOHOO Pop-up Dictionary is a Moodle package that gives the students the 
possibility to double click on any word within a Moodle HTML resource and 
retrieve its definition from an online dictionary chosen by the teacher.

name: Easy
description: A very basic theme, made easy for new themers.

name: Course wizard
description:
With this block a user with specific rights can easily create new courses and enrol
users into the new course just by adding their e-mail addresses.

name: CPD
description: Allows Moodle users to log their CPD via their user profiles.

name: GISMO
description: GISMO, a graphical interactive student monitoring and tracking system that extracts tracking data from an online course maintained with Moodle, and generates graphical representations that can be explored by course instructors.

name: UI Custom CSS
description:
The uicustomcss module is designed to allow instructors of a course to create custom css that will only be applied to their
course and, if they choose, other pages inside their course.

name: ODS OAI-PMH
description: This Moodle block plugin serves as Data Provider for OAI-PMH 2.0 Harvester. Plugin enables Moodle administrator to define global settings for Data Provider as well as default metadata sharing for courses.

name: makeanonymous
description: This plugin anonymizes data of deleted users, optionally with a delay time.

name: Compatibility Test
description: This local plug-in provides the functionality to check the users browser (Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Safari), Flash, Java, Quicktime and/or Silverlight version against a pre-set minimum version and notify the user that they are not meeting the sites minimum requirements.

name: Compile discussions
description: This block will list all the forums and advanced forums in a course, in two drop-down menus. Selection of a forum from the menu will display all discussions in that forum, in nested layout, on a single page. This can be convenient for printing.

name: One-to-one
description: Whiteboard with Video conference - Made for one to one interaction between Teacher and Student.

name: Formilla Live Chat
description: Live chat software with real-time visitor monitoring for your Moodle site.  Answer questions and support your users with live chat!

name: Image drag & drop
description: Automatically uploads images dropped into Atto from your computer.

name: OWLL oohoo Web-based Language Lab (formerly MoodLL)
description:
This is a new version (v3) of what used to be MoodLL.

Basically, this replaces the traditional cassette tape language lab. There is a module for students to record themselves and teachers to review and grade the work. This version also includes a class monitor. So, if a teacher uses it inside the classroom, he/she can monitor student progress the same way they used the traditional language lab by listening to live streams of the students, responding live to students, giving a thumbs up and so on.

name: a2fa QR code input
description: A QR field for the A2FA plugin (Another 2-Factor Authentication)

name: Canvas
description: Question import format to import questions saved as an XML file from the Canvas LMS into Moodle.

name: STACK response analysis
description: A legacy report on the outcomes of any STACK questions in a quiz. (Not currently maintained)

name: Old Superscript/subscript editor please do not use any more
description: Please use https://moodle.org/plugins/editor_ousupsub instead of this plugin.

name: Structure match with editor
description:
A question type that is answered by drawing a structure in the ChemDoodle Web Sketcher. The drawing is converted to InChI and compared to the given answer(s).
The teacher can give multiple correct or semi-correct answers.
Requires OpenBabel to be installed (in /usr/local/bin/obabel or else the code needs amending in question.php).

name: Login/Logout user redirection
description: Allows sysadmin to force redirection to certain pages upon login or logout.

name: WebRTC Experiments
description:
Discontinued. Please, do not use it in production.
This is a Moodle plugin for users interact with audio and video using WebRTC

name: YouTube submission
description: The YouTube assignment submission allows students to record or upload videos directly into YouTube from within an assignment. The video file is stored on YouTube, though it is accessible from Moodle. This allows students to submit long videos, videos in different formats and to use almost any PC or device.

name: SWF-Activity-Module
description: The SWF Activity Module is a Moodle plugin for deploying multimedia Flash learning applications, also known as Flash templates, videos, and playlists.

name: PCBook
description: This is a block which links to a pcbook server and shows how many of your computers are free or busy.

name: Name to Structure or Reaction
description: Name to structure (or reaction) question type.  You can ask studnts to draw chemical structures or reactions.  This plugin requires Marvin Applets from Chemaxon.

name: STACK 2.0 format
description: This format imports questions saved from STACK 2 servers.

name: COinS
description: The point of the filter is to automatically link from citations to the full-text of articles online, using the OpenURL mechanism. One of the easiest ways to get COinS data into a Moodle page is to drag and drop a citation from the Zotero citation management software into the Moodle html editor. As long as Zotero is configured to 'Copy as HTML' in the 'Quick Copy' setting, this will include a COinS and formatted reference when you drag and drop into an HTML editor.

name: YouTube Anywhere
description: YouTube Anywhere enables direct recording and uploading into YouTube from the TinyMCE HTML editor.

name: ZiLink - SAML Authentication
description: The ZiLink plugins work together - please ensure you download and install the full set of ZiLink plugins. The extent of integration depends on the data being available within the school MIS. Data integration is supplied by ZiNET Connect - 30-day trial, ZiLink Community Programme or Premier Support is available.

name: Spectra Filter (Chemdoodle)
description: A Moodle text filter that convert links to JCAMP-DX files (*.jdx) to interactive Chemdoodle Web Component Spectra Canvas's.

name: My Grades report
description: A Moodle Report that shows all user grades in all courses

name: Reset Password
description: This local plugin allows an external service to access Moodle's reset password functionality.

name: Upload Metacourse links
description:
This block allows linking of metacourses and child courses by upload of CSV flatfiles.
Imports can be done by ad-hoc upload, or by a regular cron job.

name: MediaCore Atto Editor Chooser
description: The MediaCore Moodle plugin gives your Moodle users one-click access to the MediaCore Chooser — allowing them to easily upload and embed media to any Moodle page, straight from inside Moodle.

name: Engagement analytics
description: The Engagement Analytics block provides information about student progress against a range of indicators. As the name suggests the block provides feedback on the level of "engagement" of a student, in this plugin "engagement" refers to activities which have been identified by current research to have an impact on student success in an online course.

name: Lernstar
description: Full responsive theme (for desktop, tablet, smartphone) in different custom colors.

name: Formal white
description: Formal White is a fluid-width, three-column theme built upon both Base and Canvas, two parent themes included in the Moodle core. This theme was coded and is maintained by MediaTouch 2000.

name: Course overview lite
description:
The Course overview lite block is faster and lighter replacement for the default Course Overview block.
Features include; ajax course detailed overview, active course highlighting, users can hide specific courses, users can reorder the course listing, customizable alert area, toggle simplified and detailed course views, and improved page load speed.

name: Grade history
description: A grader report for Moodle that allows you to view an audit trail of what happened to grades overtime.

name: Manager Interactive Activities of iAssign
description: This plugin is a block allowing access an area to the teachers' cooperation for manager interactive activities of iAssign.

name: Insert interactive activity (iAssign) by TinyMCE editor
description: This plugin is a plugin for TinyMCE editor for insert any iLM (interactive Learning Modules) activities in any Moodle text.

name: iAssign Filter
description: This plugin is a filter to incorporate any iLM (interactive Learning Modules) activities in any Moodle text.

name: MindMap Course
description: MindMap Course block development is now continued as MindMap format: https://moodle.org/plugins/view/format_mindmap

name: Insert Media gallery
description: Allows you to have carousels of a media gallery or galleries displayed in your course in labels and such.

name: Videofile
description: Easy cross-browser compatibility videos using Video.js.

name: Roster
description:
The Roster block shows a page with a list of users in a course, with either a simply list of names,email, etc.  (similar to the participant functionality), or a more enhanced list that shows their picture and the description from the student profiles. This is useful for faculty to get to know their students quickly and learn about their backgrounds easily.

Please note that the most up-to-date version will always be in the github repository listed below. The Moodle module downloadable here may not be updated as frequently.

The latest versions (for 2.4, 2.6 and 2.7) fix a bug where the settings page on sites installed from Moodle 2.x did not show the list of roles properly. (This worked on 1.x => 2.x upgraded sites).

name: MediaCore Repository File Picker
description: Provides a custom 'repository' file picker as part of Moodle's built-in media integration.

name: MediaCore Package Configuration
description: Provides LTI integration libraries and configuration setup that is used by the other MediaCore plugins.

name: MediaCore TinyMCE Editor Chooser
description: The MediaCore Moodle plugin gives your Moodle users one-click access to the MediaCore Chooser — allowing them to easily upload and embed media to any Moodle page, straight from inside Moodle.

name: MediaCore Media Filter
description: Transforms the video URLs generated by the TinyMCE and Repository plugins into MediaCore's embedded media player.

name: Social Bookmark
description: Social Bookmarking block for Moodle. Allows students to add and rate bookmarks.

name: Electron Pushing / Curved Arrow
description: Curved Arrow / Electron Pushing question can be used to test and strengthen students knowledge of reaction mechanism, resonance and curved arrow notation.  This plugin requires Marvin Applets from Chemaxon.

name: Word count
description: This plugin prints a word count in the bottom right-hand corner of your TinyMCE editor which updates as you type.

name: Course module access (section level participation)
description: Participation report tailored to sections as opposed to activities.

name: Earth
description:
Earth is a fluid-width 2 column theme based on Binarius, for Moodle 2.x. It is part of a series of ten 'Planet' themes intended to provide a choice of visually accessible and/or fun colour schemes.

Earth is designed to provide a lower contrast interface for reading while maintaining clear visibility. It also includes a version of the MoodleBar developed by Lewis Carr, and uses the autohide functionality for course editing buttons outlined by Frankie Kam. The auto-hide means that editing buttons are only visible when you rollover them with editing on, reducing screen clutter.

name: VL eBooks
description: This block offers customers using the Moodle VLE a seamless login to VLeBooks and can be added to a Moodle homepage or course. The Moodle block will display the VleBooks logo and the text 'Click to log in'. When clicked the block will build a validated url to call and seamlessly log in to VLeBooks.

name: Course module modification notification
description: This simple plugin sends users daily digests of changed content within their enrolled courses.

name: Café con leche
description:
Theme based in Decaf, more easily customizable.
ES: Tema basado en Decaf, más fácimente personalizable y traducido, también, al español.

name: Insert module at cursor
description: Enables editing teachers to add activities and resources above the activity below the cursor

name: Help Me Now Block
description: This moodle block creates a chat interface for students and teachers to connect.  It also provides a help desk chat interface for students to ask questions of the teachers/admins who are assigned as helpers and currently logged in. It also has plugins for multiple sharing tools that can be enabled.

name: Help Desk
description: Moodle help desk block to facilitate technical support within Moodle.

name: Repositório SWORD Upload
description: Plugin to upload lerning objects to DSpace and link it in Moodle

name: Engagement analytics
description: This is the indicator component of the Engagement analytics suite. Make sure to also get the report and block!

name: Webinar
description: Enables web conferencing between Moodle and Adobe Connect to be added as an activity to any course.

name: Media gallery search
description: This plugin allows users to add a search block for galleries to their courses.

name: Ephorus Plagiarism plugin
description: Please see https://moodle.org/plugins/plagiarism_turnitin for further information.

name: Alternative PHP cache (APC)
description:
The alternative PHP cache (APC) is an opcode cache for PHP that provides a persistent application data store cache to PHP applications.
This plugin allows the use of that APC data store as a Moodle cache store. In turn allowing you to use APC within Moodle.

name: slate
description: This is a bootswatch theme for the Bootstrap3 theme

name: oohoo - Text to Speech
description: OOHOO Text to Speech is a Moodle block that reads outloud the content of a resource

name: Enhanced multilang
description: An alternate multilang filter that supports content with nested span.

name: MoodleDT - Development Tools Plugins for Moodle
description: This plugin is a set of tools to assist in developing plugins in Moodle.

name: Word count
description: A simple plugin that adds a "Word count" submission type to assign activities.

name: Controlled Mnet Access
description:
User Mnet Host block is an extension of Mnet_Host bloc
allowing access controlled display of MNET accesses depending on some
custom dedicated user profile fields settings.

name: Ascendants courses
description:
Course ascendant block allows controlling from a normal
Moodle course attachement of submodules as metacourses.

name: CPF input
description: A cpf profile field type for moodle

name: Elcentra Social Login
description: Updated! This plugin gives you an easy way of letting your users login through their Facebook, Twitter, Google, LinkedIn and VKontakte (New!) accounts.

name: Memcached Cluster
description: Memcached caching plugin that allows separate but synced stores, particularly useful for load balanced installs.

name: Memcache Cluster
description: Memcache caching plugin that allows separate but synced stores, particularly useful for load balanced installs.

name: Descendants courses
description: Works oppositely to block Course Ascendants as giving shortlinks to descendant courses (Supercourses)

name: QuestionTeX format
description: QuestionTeX is a collection of LaTeX macros that enable authors to create multiple-choice tests.

name: Faculty Contact
description: Faculty Contact block creates an auto-generated list of faculty and their contact information on a course.

name: eCampus eBook Page
description: This module add a resource that can create a direct link into a specific page in an eCampus eBook. This is only useful if your institution has the eCampus services. Requires the block 'ecampus_tbird' v1.1 or greater

name: eCampus
description: This block provides a simple single-sign-on method between Moodle and the eCampus online bookstore site.

name: Tripleplay Repository Plugin
description: Tripleplay Repository plugin allows Tripleplay users to embed content from Tripleplay Systems into Moodle.

name: Tripleplay Filter plugin
description: The Tripleplay Filter plugin will automatically convert media inserted using the Tripleplay repository plugin to display the content.

name: Engagement analytics
description: The Engagement Analytics block provides information about student progress against a range of indicators. As the name suggests the block provides feedback on the level of "engagement" of a student, in this plugin "engagement" refers to activities which have been identified by current research to have an impact on student success in an online course.

name: Drag and Drop Organic Chemistry Nomenclature
description: Students construct the names of organic molecules by dragging and dropping.

name: Fischer Projections
description:
Student must construct Fischer projections by drag and drop of groups onto a predefined template.

You can ask questions like;

Draw L-alanine?
Convert the following structure into a Fischer projection?

name: Newman Projections
description: Drag and drop question in which students build Newman projections.  Tests students knowledge of drawing and interpreting Newman Projections.

name: More lock factories
description: Additional lock factories for the new locking framework. Supports memcache and memcached.

name: Standard (legacy)
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Standard
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Splash
description:
This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins. 
This theme will work on Moodle 2.8, 2.9 & 3.0.

name: Sky High
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Serenity
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Overlay
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Nonzero
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Nimble
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Magazine
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Leatherbound
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Fusion
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: FormFactor
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Brick
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Boxxie
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Binarius
description: This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins

name: Arialist
description:
This theme was part of the Moodle core distribution, but for Moodle 2.7+ has been moved to Moodle Plugins. 

Arialist should work on most Moodle versions provided that you have the both Base theme and Canvas theme installed. Both of these themes are available from the Moodle Plugins directory.

name: Select Atoms or Molecules
description: Atoms, molecules and reaction selection question type.  Requires Marvin Applets downloadable from www.chemaxon.com.

name: Password Expiration Check
description: Password Expire Authentication plugin

name: Lewis Structures
description: The Lewis structure question type allows teachers to design problems in which students must assign formal charges or add lone pair electrons/radicals to atoms in molecules.  This question type requires Marvin Applets by Chemaxon.

name: 2D/3D Structure Display Short Answer
description: Short answer question type in which the teacher can easily build 2D/3D structures in Marvin Sketch and display in Marvin View.  Requires Marvin Applets from Chemaxon.

name: LAE User report
description: User report with actual weights, contribution column and 'what if'

name: LAE Grader Report
description: Alternative to Grader report that scrolls vertically and horizontally without losing student columns or grade item header rows.  Lot of additional enhancements.

name: HTML+
description:
An extended HTML plugin for atto which adds source beautification, and the code mirror source editor.
Note: This plugin is now included in Moodle core as a part of the standard html plugin.

name: oohoo - Calendar format
description: This course format displays a course in a calendar format.

name: oohoo - Capture
description:
This repository allows users to record video, sound and take a photo WITHOUT a streaming server.
This works as any other Moodle 2.x repository. It must first be enabled. Once enabled, it will show up in the file picker. Simply click on the "Capture" repository and choose if you want to record a sound, a video or have a picture taken from your webcam.

Once you are done recording, you can edit your video by trimming the beginning and the end.

name: oohoo - TabTopics format
description: This Moodle course format displays each section in a tab

name: oohoo - Course search
description:
OOHOO Course Search does a complete search of all content in a course including:
 - Section Name and description
 - All activities (including all new plugins that you setup in the future) based on the "name", "intro" and "content" fields

The result appears as a list of links.

name: QuickScan Dyslexia Screening
description: This is the Pico QuickScan Dyslexia Screening block for Moodle 2.3+.

name: Srce 2.2 - Universal Design Theme
description: This theme is made for better visual accessibility mode, but with design and colors that retain good look. It doesn't have super-high contrast, which can be set with block Accessibility, but it has bigger and leveled fonts for better visual accessiblity.

name: Quicksets
description: Quickly set course and grades visibility, number of visible sections and "Edit sections" -- insert, delete, reorder, rename any course sections from one screen.

name: MooProfile
description: Displays user(s) profile in a block

name: User role assignment from LDAP
description: This plugin allows you to configure automatic synchronisation of relationships between users from a LDAP server. It is mainly used to assign Parent/Mentor rôle.

name: Group Network Control
description: This block provides teacher or less power user a mean to open network access to students in a User Mnet Hosts moderated Moodle NETwork

name: Quick enrollment
description: With this plugin you can quickly enroll users to many courses.

name: Blur Names
description: The presence of this block on gradebook and some other pages will blur the names, email addresses, and images of students - e.g., in both the Grader and User Reports; and it will do the same for names in Moodle core's Forum, and in the Choice module, as well. This protection of student privacy allows for more FERPA-friendly sharing among faculty.

name: theme_coursesearch
description: coursesearch theme is required by course search plugin. Installing coursesearch theme will start evaluating course search results from course search plugin out of box.

name: User info synchronization plugin
description:
This plugin synchronizes user infos from on moodle platform to another. It is designed to be used in an MNet network to roam user data created in custorm user profile fields from the moodle identity provider to the moodle identity receiver. On both instances you have to create the user profile fields with identical names in order to be able to transfer the user data.

Checkout the README for configuration and installation.

name: Playlist
description: The playlist resource plugin provides a way to save a list of rtmp URLs which can then be referenced by the filter_rtmp plugin.

name: Mediawiki
description: A repository allowing multiple instances that can each connect to any mediawiki site.

name: Mentees Improved Block
description: This Plugin is just a fix for the original mentees because the mentees have to click 3 times before reach the course, Mentees Improved hows the student courses with a direct link to the course.

name: Hidden course
description:
The block is displayed only when the course is hidden. The warning message inside the block can be modified.
--
Le bloc n’apparaît que lorsque le cours est caché. Le message dans le bloc peut être personnalisé.

name: Sanity checker utility
description: This plugin provides an interface to implement sanity checks on moodle and solves some issues (see : https://github.com/eviweb/moodle-local_sanitychecker/wiki)

name: Soundcloud
description: Replace SoundCloud URLs with the default wave player.

name: Soundcloud
description: Link to SoundCloud streams

name: Latlong (map plugin version)
description: Modified version of the latlong field, to enable use of the local_map geographical map API.

name: Map
description: API for geographical maps, to be used in other modules. Provides a simple PHP interface to add maps, markers, different tile sets, and enable users to add a marker (including reverse geocoding).

name: PDF.js Folder
description: PDF.js Folder is a plugin intended to make sure that added PDFs always open in the browser.

name: Manage embedded files
description: This plugin will add a button to the TinyMCE text editor in Moodle that allows to manage files embedded in the current text area.

name: COORAD
description: Coorad Bridge is a COORAD Resource module. It let you nest within your Moodle Site all COORAD resources you need (COORAD is a free open source Configurable Object Oriented Rapid Application Development system).

name: Course Publishing Workflow
description: Publishflow reveals a strong MNET based course publishing architecture for providing a high level service for moving, cataloging, preproducing courses and organize several moodles as a courseware production supersystem.

name: Tema Moodle na Prática
description: Tema customizado por Moodle na Prática que teve como base o tema Clean.

name: Mutant Banjo
description: A Bootstrap based theme that facilitates quick change of 'colour swatch' and font through the employment of graphical sliders.

name: Mappa
description: This is an activity module for insert flash maps into courses

name: Evernote
description: Repository to access the content of your notes from your Evernote account.

name: Atto HTML editor
description: Lightweight, accessible, fast, mobile friendly text editor.

name: Auto-link Hijacker
description: This filter shamelessly hijacks the glossary auto-links by replacing all auto-linked URLs by another arbitrary one, e.g. one pointing to Forvo.

name: User bookmarks
description: User Bookmarks allows users to bookmark any moodle page.

name: MyMobile
description: myMobile is a theme for Moodle 2+ that is customized and optimized for smart phones and tablets. It is based on jquerymobile. For a device support grid, please visit the jquerymobile website (http://jquerymobile.com/).

name: FirePHP
description: This block adds the FirePHP library (http://www.firephp.org) to your Moodle installation, mainly for development purposes.

name: Advanced RSS Feed
description: Block for RSS Feed

name: Pass grade quiz access rule
description: Prevent students from reattempting a quiz once they've reached the specified grade

name: Freehand Drawing
description: Freehand Drawing is a question type for Moodle which allows examinees to draw their solution in a quiz.

name: Assignment files
description: List all assignment files for all courses and / or user

name: PDF Parts
description: The PDF Parts module enables a teacher to provide a set of freely selected pages from a PDF file as a course resource.

name: FN - My Menu (Simple Navigation Block)
description: A simple navigation block for use as an alternative to default navigation block. After install, don't forget to hide the default Navigation block from students (but not teachers/course admins)

name: Tin Can Learner Stream
description: A block to display a learner's Tin Can activity stream

name: Evernote
description: This is the Portfolio plugin for Evernote.

name: Syslogger
description: Duplicates Moodle logs to syslog using the Linux logger command.

name: Pushover
description: A message provider that allows push notifications via the pushover.net service. Push notifications to Android and iOS devices with ease!

name: XLS with Groups and Dates
description: Grade export derived from XLS file.  Adds Groups and Dates columns

name: Crot Plagiarism Checker
description:
This FREE plugin  is aimed at digital plagiarism detection: it uncovers assignments copied from peers at the same institution. The module is language independent. 

Maintainer: Sergey Butakov
More information: crotsoftware.com

name: Oauth2 Easy
description: Obsolote: this theme is not used anymore as the Oauth2 auth plugin now display the buttons.

name: Course Tree List
description: This block will display all courses a user is enrolled in, within the hierarchy course categories listing.

name: FN - Assignment Options Reset Tool
description: The "Assignment Options Reset Tool" block is used to reset the Assignment Options for all assignments in a course. Note that it does not set defaults that are applied when creating new assignments but rather it only resets the options for existing assignments.

name: Metadata submissions
description: Adds extra metadata fields to be added as a assignment submission plugin

name: My Language Portfolio
description: The digital learning portfolio was developed by gtn solutions for ÖSZ (Austrian language center) and is an alternative digital way to work with the (European) language portfolio.

name: Music Scale
description: This question type deals with musical scales and may be useful for music theory instruction. The respondent is given a key and tonic, and is prompted to enter a scale. A question bank is included, including all major and minor scales, with and without a key signature. Answers are entered in a graphical user interface.

name: FN-Tabs Course Format Block (control panel)
description:
This block contains the "control panel" for Tabs Course Format (FN) version 2.4 located here: 

https://moodle.org/plugins/view.php?plugin=format_fntabs   

Note that version 2.5 does NOT require this block.

name: Google Analytics
description: This plugin is replaced by the local_analytics plugin which can communicate with Google Analytics and Piwik!

name: Krystle
description: Replacement/Redevelopment of the Krystle themes by Richard Oelmann

name: Zebra
description: A dynamic theme using @media queries to modify the layout on the fly.

name: User Information Block
description: This block intends to give the user a few shortcuts in order to navigate quickly through every Moodle site. Besides it advices the user about unread messages and information about the last access to the LMS. It's already translated into spanish, english, portuguese and chinese.

name: Config Log Emailer
description: This plugin sends an email to a specified user after it has detected a config setting was changed when running cron. The to and from email addresses can be changed in the settings page.

name: Linkedin
description: This is the block that must be used in combination with the LinkedIn Auth plugin

name: A 1 and all web conferencing : Dinsys Connect
description: DinSys Connect is an online conferencing product that addresses enterprises’ and businesses’ requirements in a comprehensive manner.

name: Halboo
description:
This theme was created from the Decaf theme by Lei Zhang. So it has the features of this theme :
AwesomeBar with administrative links and navigation, fluid theme 3 columns, ... Added new area for blocks, bootstrap, new styles, ...

name: Merge user accounts
description:
This script will merge two Moodle user accounts, "user A" and "user B". 
The intent of the script is to assign all activity & records from user A to 
user B. This will give the effect of user B seeming to have done everything 
both users have ever done in Moodle.

name: Recommender
description: This block offers three different recommendation services: popular activities on this course; popular courses on this site; and shared bookmarks.  Each can be enabled and configured separately.

name: Azure Active Directory
description: Allows authentication against Azure Active Directory or Office 365. Useful for EDU customers of Office 365. Must be used with the block_azuread plugin

name: Moodle2Tablet
description: This theme has been developed for tablets, compatible with iPad/Android 4.x devices. Let us know how it works for you.

name: Moodle2Mobile
description: This theme has been developed for smartphones, compatible with iPhone/iPodtouch/Android 4.x devices. Let us know how it works for you.

name: MyLiveChat
description: My LiveChat plugin for Moodle provides an easy way to integrate your Moodle-powered website with the LiveChat solution. My LiveChat is a fast, high performance and most user-friendly live chat solution. It allows you to live chat with website visitors, monitor site traffic, and analyze visitors' web activities, including their search engine and keyword usage.

name: HTML (on profile field selector)
description:
This block is a combined variant of the profilespecifichtml block and the editablecontenthtml block. 

It provides way to distribute specific content to several classes of users splitted by matching rules upon one or two profile fields (standard or customized).

name: HTML5 content editable editor
description:
Replacement text editor that uses HTML5 contenteditable regions to create a simpler and faster text editor. 

If you find any issues, please report them on github.

name: Link Bazaar
description: An activity that allows students to add links to resources relevant to a particular topic. Others can then vote for the most useful links to bring them to the top.

name: OpenDesktop
description: This combines Ulteo Open Virtual Desktop with BigBlueButton and is perfect for live online cooperation in real time.

name: boaidp
description:
This is an implementation of Moodle's Block for preloading (in a bulk and automation mode) of metadata 
associated to Moodle's Courses and their further edition (in a manually mode).

The main aims of these metadata is to serve as basis (Data Provider) for OAI-PMH 2.0 Harvester implementations.

GETTING ON GITHUB
https://github.com/mglaredo/moodle-block_boaidp

name: Mahara Local
description: Extra Mahara MNet Functions. Required for the Mahara Assignment Submission and Mahara Assignment Feedback plugins (for Moodle 2.5 and earlier)

name: Music Interval
description: This question type deals with music intervals. The respondent is given a note and is prompted to enter a second note at a given interval. Answers are entered in a graphical user interface.

name: Music Key Signature
description: This question type deals with key signatures and may be useful for music theory instruction. The respondent is given a tonality and is prompted to enter the corresponding key signature. A question bank is included, including all major and minor keys in treble and bass clefs. Answers are entered in a graphical user interface.

name: Upload tutor relationships
description:
This block allows assignment of user roles in another user's context by upload of CSV flatfiles.
Imports can be done by ad-hoc upload, or by a regular cron job.

name: External zip utility
description: Allows Moodle to use the command-line zip utility (/usr/bin/zip) instead of the PHP ZipArchive library.

name: Institutions
description: This local plugin introduces the intitutions concept into Moodle.

name: Global Chat
description: Global chat for Moodle. With this plugin teachers and students can communicate in real time through Moodle.

name: Daily usage
description:
Shows online users and daily usage that most affects performance on a graph.
Also gives information about recently updated courses.

name: sitenavigation
description: A block to navigate through all categories and subcategories of Moodle sites merged with my own previous myCourses Block to navigate own courses.

name: Microsoft Skydrive
description: A repository plugin to access your documents from Microsoft Skydrive in Moodle.

name: Accessible for VIP
description: Accessible for visually impaired people theme

name: Single activity format
description: Allows to create course that consists of only one activity

name: Spreadsheet
description: An improvement of the short answer that integrates a spreadsheet interface with an answer helper to limit to minimum input errors.

name: MyTube
description: The MyTube repository allows users to record or upload video directly into YouTube, and to select videos directly from the users account for insertion into Moodle.

name: Educator
description: Educator is a simple, clean, modern, well designed, three column layout theme. which can be easily customized for specific branding needs. Most of its customization can be done directly by theme settings without any HTML/CSS/Coding knowledge. It has variety of modification on traditional look of Moodle.

name: Embedded files
description: "Embedded files" (repository_areafiles) plugin allows to re-use the files embedded in the current text area.

name: Embedded files Plus
description: "Embedded files Plus" (repository_areafilesplus) plugin allows to re-use the files embedded in the current text area and delete unused files.

name: Above and Beyond
description: A simple, sleek new look for your personal use.

name: ConTag
description:
ConTag allows a teacher to easily tag Moodle items with concepts, that the student can then use to browse the items. A student can use this to focus on concepts that they are interested in.

Developed by the Intelligent Computer Tutoring Group (http://www.ictg.canterbury.ac.nz/)

name: LaTeX2e notation
description: True LaTeX filter, You can use pstricks

name: MySmark EDU
description:
MySmark EDU is a platform for the analysis of student satisfaction through emotional tagging.
It allows students to leave feedbacks on Moodle events using MySmark's emotional tags (www,mysmark.com).

name: BabelRoom
description: Babelroom integration module for moodle. This is a moodle activity module for creating, deleting and joining Babelroom conferences.

name: Mentees Simplified Block
description:
This block is similar to the mentees block but the display of information is much easier to access by parents. It shows only the most relevant information so parents will not be lost looking for information.

I hope it is of the greatest use. Thanks and regards.

name: Silverlight video embed filter
description: Silverlight Smooth Streaming media embed filter for Moodle 2.x. To be used with IIS Smooth Streaming server.

name: Navigation Web
description: Navigation within and between courses by the use of an interactive concept map.

name: Learner preferences
description: Holds the user model needed for adaptive navigation support of the block "Learner Adaptation" (block_case_repository) to enhance the concept map based navigation of the block "Navigation Web" (block_semantic_web).

name: Pluto
description:
Pluto is a fluid-width 2 column theme based on Binarius, for Moodle 2.4. It is part of a series of ten 'Planet' themes intended to provide a choice of visually accessible and/or fun colour schemes.

Pluto is designed to provide a high contrast interface with a dark background and yellow text. It also includes a 2.4 compatible version of the MoodleBar developed by Lewis Carr, and uses the autohide functionality for course editing buttons outlined by Frankie Kam.

name: Uranus
description:
Uranus is a fluid-width 2 column theme based on Binarius, for Moodle 2.4. It is part of a series of ten 'Planet' themes intended to provide a choice of visually accessible and/or fun colour schemes.

Uranus is designed to provide a reduced contrast interface with a light blue background. It also includes a 2.4 compatible version of the MoodleBar developed by Lewis Carr, and uses the autohide functionality for course editing buttons outlined by Frankie Kam.

name: Saturn
description:
Saturn is a fluid-width 2 column theme based on Binarius, for Moodle 2.4. It is part of a series of ten 'Planet' themes intended to provide a choice of visually accessible and/or fun colour schemes.

Saturn is designed to provide a high contrast interface with a pale yellow background. It also includes a 2.4 compatible version of the MoodleBar developed by Lewis Carr, and uses the autohide functionality for course editing buttons outlined by Frankie Kam.

name: Neptune
description:
Neptune is a fluid-width 2 column theme based on Binarius, for Moodle 2.4. It is part of a series of ten 'Planet' themes intended to provide a choice of visually accessible and/or fun colour schemes.

Neptune is designed to provide a reduced contrast interface with dark blue background and pale text. It also includes a 2.4 compatible version of the MoodleBar developed by Lewis Carr, and uses the autohide functionality for course editing buttons outlined by Frankie Kam.

name: Jupiter
description:
Jupiter is a fluid-width 2 column theme based on Binarius, for Moodle 2.4. It is part of a series of ten 'Planet' themes intended to provide a choice of visually accessible and/or fun colour schemes.

Jupiter is designed to provide a lower contrast interface for reading while maintaining clear visibility, and specificaly makes use of a pale yellow background and brown text. It also includes a 2.4 compatible version of the MoodleBar developed by Lewis Carr, and uses the autohide functionality for course editing buttons outlined by Frankie Kam.

name: Mars
description:
Mars is a fluid-width 2 column theme based on Binarius, for Moodle 2.4. It is part of a series of ten 'Planet' themes intended to provide a choice of visually accessible and/or fun colour schemes.

Mars is designed to provide a reduced contrast interface with a dark background and light text. It also includes a 2.4 compatible version of the MoodleBar developed by Lewis Carr, and uses the autohide functionality for course editing buttons outlined by Frankie Kam.

name: Luna
description:
Luna is a fluid-width 2 column theme based on Binarius, for Moodle 2.4. It is part of a series of ten 'Planet' themes intended to provide a choice of visually accessible and/or fun colour schemes.

Luna is designed to provide a reduced contrast simple interface. It also includes a 2.4 compatible version of the MoodleBar developed by Lewis Carr, and uses the autohide functionality for course editing buttons outlined by Frankie Kam.

Yes, I know that Luna (the Moon) isn't a planet - but it fits this set of solar-bodied themes and exerts influence on the Earth. Hopefully Moon lovers will find this theme aesthetically pleasing.

name: Venus
description:
Venus is a fluid-width 2 column theme based on Binarius, for Moodle 2.4. It is part of a series of ten 'Planet' themes intended to provide a choice of visually accessible and/or fun colour schemes.

Venus is designed to provide a fun, high contrast interface, and in one word would be described as PINK. It also includes a 2.4 compatible version of the MoodleBar developed by Lewis Carr, and uses the autohide functionality for course editing buttons outlined by Frankie Kam.

name: Mercury
description:
Mercury is a fluid-width 2 column theme based on Binarius, for Moodle 2.4. It is part of a series of ten 'Planet' themes intended to provide a choice of visually accessible and/or fun colour schemes.

Mercury is designed to provide a clean, simple interface with minimal graphical content. It also includes a 2.4 compatible version of the MoodleBar developed by Lewis Carr.

name: Duplicate User Accounts Report
description: This is a simple report for displaying users with duplicate accounts based on their first name and last name.

name: Learner adaptation
description: Brings adaptive navigation support to moodle (needs extensions "Navigation Web" and "Learner Preferences")

name: Count of user log records
description: One simple report counting the log records per user in a given course. Exportable to ods/xls/txt.

name: ReMarks Assignment
description: This plugin connects Moodle 2.2, 2.3, 2.4 and 2.5  with ReMarksPDF desktop and ReMarksPDF iPad e-grading solutions enabling a complete e-submission, allocation, marking, moderation and release workflow.

name: Parental Portal
description: Supports Moodle 2.3 - 2.6, using YUI2in3. This plugin is a fork of the original MIS plugin for Moodle 1.9 by Guy Thomas / Alan Hardy.

name: Facility To Moodle 2
description: Supports Moodle 2.3 thru to 2.6. Fork of Guy Thomas' original Facility-to-Moodle block for 1.7-1.9

name: Editable HTML Block
description: This very simple block behaves just as HTML block unless it allows some third party to edit content even if not having access to full course edition.

name: Alternative
description:
The Alternative activity allow students to register to one or several choices,
among a given list, in a similar maner to the Choice module, but with more flexible use cases.

name: buckle
description:
Buckle is a basic theme which uses bootstrapbase as its parent. It is designed to be built onto rather than as a 'finished' production theme in a similar manner to the 'standard' and 'clean' themes in core.
It takes bootstrapbase and adds the responsive version of the 3column HolyGrail layout.

name: Custom Lesson
description: Customlesson is a variant of the official module lesson, which allows the teacher to have a template lesson, customized for each student. The lesson template is completed by a csv file which provides all the variable fields (columns) for each of the students (rows).

name: Azure Active Directory
description: This plug in allow authentication against Azure Active Directory or Office 365. Has to be used in conjunction with auth_azuread plugin.

name: Sharedresources Library
description: A repository view of sharedresources file pool so they can be used in other context calling for files inclusion.

name: WinCache cache
description: Plugin to enable MUC access to the WinCache PHP extension available on Windows platforms.

name: Block Users
description: A local plugin that allows the site administrator to block multiple users for a certain period by uploading a csv file containing the usernames of the users to be blocked.

name: Quran Recitation
description:
A Quran recitation Block for Moodle, this is based on the open source jsQari plugin

http://code.google.com/p/jsqari/

It is used for for playing the Quran ayahs in MP3 which are provided by Verse by Verse Quran.

name: Cubic
description: Cubic is a new theme for Moodle 2.3. Its objective is to provide users with a more user-friendly interface, which provides several forms of social awareness and some new concepts.

name: Cloudyday
description:
Cloudy Day is a fixed width 2 column theme with tabbed navigation.

Cloudy Day is designed to make content look clean and crisp making use of the new Moodle icons as well. It also adds top level navigation across the top with a 'My Courses' menu added as well. Course content can appear to be a 'Tabs' and when using 'One section per page' offer an extended set of navigation tabs.

name: Online Users Map
description: Similar to the online users block, but this block uses the geographical information from users profiles to display the locations of online users on an OpenStreetMap or Google map. The geocoding of locations are cached in the Moodle database and updated when cron runs.

name: Recoil
description: This is a simple theme with fancy CSS styling.  Featuring dark foreground elements with white backgrounds.  Heavy use of drop shadows and some gradients to add a sleek and simplistic feel.

name: WinCache info
description: Plugin to provide phpinfo() style statistics about WinCache usage from within the Site Administration menu.

name: Dynamo
description: Dynamo is a 3 column theme for Moodle 2.4 (More versions soon to come).  The theme features a textured header and background, with a banner for a custom logo to display.  You can customize the colors and logo from the theme settings within Moodle.

name: Include Wikiversity pages
