name: XCache
description:
XCache is a PHP opcode cacher designed to accelerate the performance of PHP execution. One of the features it provides is a variable data store that can be used within PHP code to persist variables between requests.
This plugin is an XCache cache store designed to utilise that variable data store and allow Moodle to make better use of XCache.

name: SimpleSpace
description: This is a three column flexible width theme.

name: Count user (Add user like a moodle1.9)
description:
This plug-in is the block which counts the number assigned to the roll within a course like moodle1.9.
Only admin can be used.

name: znanja Content
description: znanja is the quickest way to get your content into eLearning.  We wanted to make getting your content into Moodle even quicker.

name: Applications

This block list all the favorite applications of a user and allows him to add new applications or access the applications management page.

This block displays the courses enrolled by the users with the enrolled date. This block also displays the course transcripts once the user completes the course with any of the course completion criteria.

Note: This block need the  "certificate" module to be installed to get the transcripts.

name: Leoblue

This plugin is no longer maintained, and will receive no future support.
An updated version of Gennaro Varriale's Google Adsense block to work with Moodle 2.x. It allows the easy creation and display of Google Adsense blocks within Moodle.

name: Profile Field Enrolment
description: Allows binding an enrollment strategy to some value in the user profile

name: POAS assignment
description:
The poasassignment module allows teachers to develop single task or variations of task, collect work from students, review it and provide feedback including multi-criterion grades. Module can distribute multiple task’s variants between students in different ways, using one of distribution strategies.

The module is based on old Assignment module, but it doesn’t use sources of old Assignment  - only idea. Poasassignment extends old Assignment by introducing variants (no more single task for dozens of students), criteria for grading and sub-plugin system. That means, that all submission types, all distribute strategies, are plugins, that can be modified separately from the core.

name: Bakery SSO

name: courseprovider

1.This Plugin lets you add a link to the courses available on other LMS in your Course as an Activity Link.
2.This activity lets users to view the courses available in other LMS websites.

name: AJAX Marking Block
description: Shows a teacher all of the unmarked work which has been submitted by their students across all of the courses they teach in. It's most useful when placed on the front page, and it allows the work to be viewed and graded through a pop-up interface, which then updates the block once the work is marked.

name: jQuery
description: Adds the jQuery library for (safe) use in a block, theme, or plugin.

name: Web Service Get Contexts

It is a web service designed to return contexts providing context level and instance ID.
It includes a simple example.

过滤器会查找土豆视频，代之以适当的嵌入代码链接。

过滤器会查找优酷视频，代之以适当的嵌入代码链接。

The module makes a course completion certificate for students.

course section.

Ce filtre construit un menu dynamique affichant les cours de l'utilisateur ou tous les cours (au choix)

description:
Crotpro is a connector to FREE plagiarism detection service. 
-At the moment search is being performed on English Wikipedia only. As studies show about 10% of plagiarisd papers coming from Wikipedia. Crot Software is planning to extend the search scope in the nearest future. 
-There is a limitation of 10 free checkups per month. 

Refer to the README file for more details on the service. 

Please note that service is on the BETA testing stage.

This new extension allows moodletxt to capture site/course notifications, personal messages and other message events within Moodle, and then send those messages out via SMS.

It may also be used as a way to dissect a pdf document for electronic delivery where a page or pages at the beginning or end of the document are not relevant to the end user.

**PLUGIN NO LONGER MAINTAINED**

The set consists of a report which allows the criteria to be benchmarked and a block to publicise the award to the teacher(s).

 How much is {apples} + {oranges}

If the user has no profile on CertificatesWall.com then nothing is displayed.

!!!Deprecated by the core Capabilites Report (Site Administration > Users > Permissions > Capability report. )!!! 
A report that compares the permissions of all roles, side by side, to assist the coordinator to give capabilities and avoid inconsistencies in roles hierarch.

Users can only pass to the next question when they finds the correct answer, skip the question (max penalization applied) or reach the maximum number of attempts per question.

A modified version of the HTML block that allows the block to change or hide depending on whether
the user is accessing the page though a local network, or the public Internet.

Use with caution.

Simple enrolment plugin for Moodle 2.x using the DPS "Payment Express" credit

This new type of question allows the teacher to create multiple areas or spots within an image for self-evaluation.

name: Design Project

name: Authentication broker loginza.ru

name: Login+

name: My Files

name: Book

name: Red Drop Down Menus

description:
The NOACSC Progressbook grade export module exports grades in a format that can be directly imported in the Progressbook gradebook application.

When in your gradebook, the entry "NOACSC Progressbook file" will be available with the other grade export options that ship with Moodle.  Select that option and follow the prompts.

name: Amazon Associates Block
description: This is a simple block which allows you to put amazon associates links into your moodle using either keywords or ISBN numbers.

name: Topic Forums course format
description: Topic Forums course format adds forums below the topic sections of the Onetopic course format. Each topic has its own discussion forum.

name: Flickr Image Carousel
description: Displays a scrollable carousel of images from a Flickr photostream (or a random static picture if Javascript not available)

name: Flexi_ii
description: A theme for admins who do not have regular access to server files. It has a very comprehensive settings page to allow changes to the theme.

name: ConfigTabs
description: ConfigTabs is a local plugin that converts any configuration form in Moodle from a scrolled page to a tab view page.

name: Scratch embed
description: A filter plug-in to embed Scratch projects using the Scratch Java applet.

name: SimpleSpeak text-to-speech
description: A Moodle filter to provide speech synthesis (text-to-speech/ TTS) services for arbitrary text.

name: Timeline Widget
description: A filter to embed an MIT SIMILE Timeline Javascript interactive widget. You and your class can use it to visualize temporal/ historical data.

name: Mandarin
description: It’s designed for Moodle 2.1.1, and it’s compatible with all modern browsers.

name: Education Book
description: Education Book has a simple and clean design. It has a flexible system that enable the administrator to adjust the top menu and choose your own favorite color scheme.

name: OpenSocial gadgets module
description: This is a plugin to add OpenSocial gadgets to the Moodle. OpenSocial gadgets are rendered via Apache Shindig (version 2.0) in an iGoogle similar fashion.

name: OpenSocial gadget block
description: This is a plugin to add OpenSocial gadgets to the Moodle as blocks.

name: OU search
description: Provides an indexed full-text search backend for OU activity modules.

name: Lagomorph
description: A css3 based theme intended to be suitable for tablet/mobile use. This theme also incorporates new block positions in the centre section

name: SCORM Cloud Course Format
description: Provides a SCORM Cloud course format. (superseded by the new Single activity course format plugin)

name: Moodle Hub server
description: Legacy plugin implementing the server side of the Moodle Hub framework, running at moodle.net.

name: Moss
description: Detect source code plagiarism in assignments

name: UploadPDF grade report
description: View assignment grades, comments and lateness in a report
